GP10bhp_05u:222: BhP_05.04.012/1 iti bhāgavata-dharma-darśanā nava mahā-bhāgavatās teṣāṃ sucaritaṃ bhagavan-mahimopabṛṃhitaṃ vasudeva-nārada-saṃvādam upaśamāyanam upariṣṭād varṇayiṣyāmaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:223: BhP_05.04.013/1 yavīyāṃsa ekāśītir jāyanteyāḥ pitur ādeśakarā mahā-śālīnā
GP10bhp_05u:224: mahā-śrotriyā yajña-śīlāḥ karma-viśuddhā brāhmaṇā babhūvuḥ BhP_05.04.014/1 bhagavān ṛṣabha-saṃjña ātma-tantraḥ svayaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:225: nitya-nivṛttānartha-paramparaḥ kevalānandānubhava īśvara eva viparītavat karmāṇy ārabhamāṇaḥ kālenānugataṃ dharmam ācaraṇenopaśikṣayann atad-vidāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:228: BhP_05.04.015/1 yad yac chīrṣaṇyācaritaṃ tat tad anuvartate lokaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:229: BhP_05.04.016/1 yadyapi sva-viditaṃ sakala-dharmaṃ brāhmaṃ guhyaṃ brāhmaṇair darśita-mārgeṇa sāmādibhir upāyair janatām anuśaśāsa
GP10bhp_05u:231: sarvair api kratubhir yathopadeśaṃ śata-kṛtva iyāja
GP10bhp_05u:232: BhP_05.04.018/1 bhagavatarṣabheṇa parirakṣyamāṇa etasmin varṣe na kaścana
GP10bhp_05u:233: puruṣo vāñchaty avidyamānam ivātmano 'nyasmāt kathañcana kimapi karhicid
GP10bhp_05u:235: BhP_05.04.019/1 sa kadācid aṭamāno bhagavān ṛṣabho brahmāvarta-gato
GP10bhp_05u:238: BhP_05.05.001/0 ṛṣabha uvāca BhP_05.05.001/1 nāyaṃ deho deha-bhājāṃ nṛloke kaṣṭān kāmān
GP10bhp_05u:240: BhP_05.05.001/2 tapo divyaṃ putrakā yena sattvaṃ śuddhyed yasmād
GP10bhp_05u:241: brahma-saukhyaṃ tv anantam BhP_05.05.002/1 mahat-sevāṃ dvāram āhur vimuktes tamo-dvāraṃ
GP10bhp_05u:243: BhP_05.05.002/2 mahāntas te sama-cittāḥ praśāntā vimanyavaḥ suhṛdaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:244: sādhavo ye BhP_05.05.003/1 ye vā mayīśe kṛta-sauhṛdārthā janeṣu dehambhara-vārtikeṣu
GP10bhp_05u:245: BhP_05.05.003/2 gṛheṣu jāyātmaja-rātimatsu na prīti-yuktā yāvad-arthāś ca loke BhP_05.05.004/1 nūnaṃ pramattaḥ kurute vikarma yad indriya-prītaya āpṛṇoti
GP10bhp_05u:246: BhP_05.05.004/2 na sādhu manye yata ātmano 'yam asann api kleśada āsa dehaḥ BhP_05.05.005/1 parābhavas tāvad abodha-jāto yāvan na jijñāsata
GP10bhp_05u:248: BhP_05.05.005/2 yāvat kriyās tāvad idaṃ mano vai karmātmakaṃ yena śarīra-bandhaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:249: BhP_05.05.006/1 evaṃ manaḥ karma-vaśaṃ prayuṅkte avidyayātmany upadhīyamāne
GP10bhp_05u:250: BhP_05.05.006/2 prītir na yāvan mayi vāsudeve na mucyate deha-yogena tāvat
GP10bhp_05u:251: BhP_05.05.007/1 yadā na paśyaty ayathā guṇehāṃ svārthe pramattaḥ sahasā vipaścit
GP10bhp_05u:252: BhP_05.05.007/2 gata-smṛtir vindati tatra tāpān āsādya maithunyam agāram
GP10bhp_05u:254: BhP_05.05.008/1 puṃsaḥ striyā mithunī-bhāvam etaṃ tayor mitho
GP10bhp_05u:256: BhP_05.05.008/2 ato gṛha-kṣetra-sutāpta-vittair janasya moho 'yam ahaṃ mameti BhP_05.05.009/1 yadā mano-hṛdaya-granthir asya karmānubaddho dṛḍha
GP10bhp_05u:258: BhP_05.05.009/2 tadā janaḥ samparivartate 'smād muktaḥ paraṃ yāty atihāya hetum BhP_05.05.010/1 haṃse gurau mayi bhaktyānuvṛtyā vitṛṣṇayā dvandva-titikṣayā ca
GP10bhp_05u:259: BhP_05.05.010/2 sarvatra jantor vyasanāvagatyā jijñāsayā tapasehā-nivṛttyā
GP10bhp_05u:260: BhP_05.05.011/1 mat-karmabhir mat-kathayā ca nityaṃ mad-deva-saṅgād
GP10bhp_05u:263: BhP_05.05.012/1 adhyātma-yogena vivikta-sevayā prāṇendriyātmābhijayena sadhryak BhP_05.05.012/2 sac-chraddhayā brahmacaryeṇa śaśvad asampramādena yamena vācām BhP_05.05.013/1 sarvatra mad-bhāva-vicakṣaṇena jñānena vijñāna-virājitena
GP10bhp_05u:264: BhP_05.05.013/2 yogena dhṛty-udyama-sattva-yukto liṅgaṃ vyapohet kuśalo
GP10bhp_05u:266: BhP_05.05.014/1 karmāśayaṃ hṛdaya-granthi-bandham avidyayāsāditam apramattaḥ BhP_05.05.014/2 anena yogena yathopadeśaṃ samyag vyapohyoparameta yogāt
GP10bhp_05u:267: BhP_05.05.015/1 putrāṃś ca śiṣyāṃś ca nṛpo gurur vā mal-loka-kāmo
GP10bhp_05u:269: BhP_05.05.015/2 itthaṃ vimanyur anuśiṣyād ataj-jñān na yojayet karmasu
GP10bhp_05u:271: BhP_05.05.015/3 kaṃ yojayan manujo 'rthaṃ labheta nipātayan naṣṭa-dṛśaṃ hi garte BhP_05.05.016/1 lokaḥ svayaṃ śreyasi naṣṭa-dṛṣṭir yo 'rthān samīheta
GP10bhp_05u:273: BhP_05.05.016/2 anyonya-vairaḥ sukha-leśa-hetor ananta-duḥkhaṃ ca na veda
GP10bhp_05u:275: BhP_05.05.017/1 kas taṃ svayaṃ tad-abhijño vipaścid avidyāyām antare
GP10bhp_05u:277: BhP_05.05.017/2 dṛṣṭvā punas taṃ saghṛṇaḥ kubuddhiṃ prayojayed utpathagaṃ yathāndham BhP_05.05.018/1 gurur na sa syāt sva-jano na sa syāt pitā na sa syāj jananī na sā syāt BhP_05.05.018/2 daivaṃ na tat syān na patiś ca sa syān na mocayed yaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:279: BhP_05.05.019/1 idaṃ śarīraṃ mama durvibhāvyaṃ sattvaṃ hi me hṛdayaṃ yatra
GP10bhp_05u:281: BhP_05.05.019/2 pṛṣṭhe kṛto me yad adharma ārād ato hi mām ṛṣabhaṃ prāhur āryāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:282: BhP_05.05.020/1 tasmād bhavanto hṛdayena jātāḥ sarve mahīyāṃsam amuṃ sanābham BhP_05.05.020/2 akliṣṭa-buddhyā bharataṃ bhajadhvaṃ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ tad bharaṇaṃ prajānām
GP10bhp_05u:283: BhP_05.05.021/1 bhūteṣu vīrudbhya uduttamā ye sarīsṛpās teṣu
GP10bhp_05u:285: BhP_05.05.021/2 tato manuṣyāḥ pramathās tato 'pi gandharva-siddhā
GP10bhp_05u:286: vibudhānugā ye BhP_05.05.022/1 devāsurebhyo maghavat-pradhānā dakṣādayo brahma-sutās tu teṣām BhP_05.05.022/2 bhavaḥ paraḥ so 'tha viriñca-vīryaḥ sa mat-paro 'haṃ
GP10bhp_05u:288: BhP_05.05.023/1 na brāhmaṇais tulaye bhūtam anyat paśyāmi viprāḥ kim ataḥ
GP10bhp_05u:289: paraṃ tu BhP_05.05.023/2 yasmin nṛbhiḥ prahutaṃ śraddhayāham aśnāmi kāmaṃ na
GP10bhp_05u:291: BhP_05.05.024/1 dhṛtā tanūr uśatī me purāṇī yeneha sattvaṃ paramaṃ pavitram
GP10bhp_05u:292: BhP_05.05.024/2 śamo damaḥ satyam anugrahaś ca tapas titikṣānubhavaś ca yatra
GP10bhp_05u:293: BhP_05.05.025/1 matto 'py anantāt parataḥ parasmāt svargāpavargādhipater na kiñcit
GP10bhp_05u:294: BhP_05.05.025/2 yeṣāṃ kim u syād itareṇa teṣām akiñcanānāṃ mayi bhakti-bhājām
GP10bhp_05u:295: BhP_05.05.026/1 sarvāṇi mad-dhiṣṇyatayā bhavadbhiś carāṇi bhūtāni sutā dhruvāṇi BhP_05.05.026/2 sambhāvitavyāni pade pade vo vivikta-dṛgbhis tad u hārhaṇaṃ me BhP_05.05.027/1 mano-vaco-dṛk-karaṇehitasya sākṣāt-kṛtaṃ me paribarhaṇaṃ hi
GP10bhp_05u:296: BhP_05.05.027/2 vinā pumān yena mahā-vimohāt kṛtānta-pāśān na vimoktum īśet
GP10bhp_05u:298: BhP_05.05.028/1 evam anuśāsyātmajān svayam anuśiṣṭān api lokānuśāsanārthaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:304: unmatta iva gagana-paridhānaḥ prakīrṇa-keśa ātmany āropitāhavanīyo brahmāvartāt pravavrāja BhP_05.05.029/1 jaḍāndha-mūka-badhira-piśāconmādakavad-avadhūta-veṣo
GP10bhp_05u:305: 'bhibhāṣyamāṇo 'pi janānāṃ gṛhīta-mauna-vratas tūṣṇīṃ babhūva BhP_05.05.030/1 tatra tatra pura-grāmākara-kheṭa-vāṭa-kharvaṭa-śibira-vraja-ghoṣa-sārtha-giri-vanāśramādiṣv
GP10bhp_05u:306: anupatham avanicarāpasadaiḥ paribhūyamāno makṣikābhir iva vana-gajas
GP10bhp_05u:308: tad avigaṇayann evāsat-saṃsthāna etasmin dehopalakṣaṇe sad-apadeśa
GP10bhp_05u:318: BhP_05.05.032/1 yarhi vāva sa bhagavān lokam imaṃ yogasyāddhā pratīpam ivācakṣāṇas tat-pratikriyā-karma bībhatsitam iti vratam ājagaram-āsthitaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:319: śayāna evāśnāti pibati khādaty avamehati hadati sma ceṣṭamāna uccarita
GP10bhp_05u:321: BhP_05.05.033/1 tasya ha yaḥ purīṣa-surabhi-saugandhya-vāyus taṃ deśaṃ daśa-yojanaṃ samantāt surabhiṃ cakāra
GP10bhp_05u:322: BhP_05.05.034/1 evaṃ go-mṛga-kāka-caryayā vrajaṃs tiṣṭhann āsīnaḥ śayānaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:324: BhP_05.05.035/1 iti nānā-yoga-caryācaraṇo bhagavān kaivalya-patir ṛṣabho
GP10bhp_05u:334: BhP_05.06.002/0 ṛṣir uvāca BhP_05.06.002/1 satyam uktaṃ kintv iha vā eke na manaso 'ddhā viśrambham anavasthānasya śaṭha-kirāta iva saṅgacchante BhP_05.06.003/0 tathā coktam BhP_05.06.003/1 na kuryāt karhicit sakhyaṃ manasi hy anavasthite
GP10bhp_05u:335: BhP_05.06.003/2 yad-viśrambhāc cirāc cīrṇaṃ caskanda tapa aiśvaram BhP_05.06.004/1 nityaṃ dadāti kāmasya cchidraṃ tam anu ye 'rayaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:336: BhP_05.06.004/2 yoginaḥ kṛta-maitrasya patyur jāyeva puṃścalī
GP10bhp_05u:337: BhP_05.06.005/1 kāmo manyur mado lobhaḥ śoka-moha-bhayādayaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:338: BhP_05.06.005/2 karma-bandhaś ca yan-mūlaḥ svīkuryāt ko nu tad budhaḥ BhP_05.06.006/1 athaivam akhila-loka-pāla-lalāmo 'pi vilakṣaṇair jaḍavad avadhūta-veṣa-bhāṣā-caritair avilakṣita-bhagavat-prabhāvo yogināṃ
GP10bhp_05u:339: sāmparāya-vidhim anuśikṣayan sva-kalevaraṃ jihāsur ātmany ātmānam
GP10bhp_05u:340: asaṃvyavahitam anarthāntara-bhāvenānvīkṣamāṇa uparatānuvṛttir upararāma BhP_05.06.007/1 tasya ha vā evaṃ mukta-liṅgasya bhagavata ṛṣabhasya yogamāyā-vāsanayā deha imāṃ jagatīm abhimānābhāsena saṅkramamāṇaḥ koṅka-veṅka-kuṭakān dakṣiṇa-karṇāṭakān deśān yadṛcchayopagataḥ kuṭakācalopavana āsya kṛtāśma-kavala unmāda iva mukta-mūrdhajo 'saṃvīta
GP10bhp_05u:342: tad vanam ālelihānaḥ saha tena dadāha
GP10bhp_05u:344: rājārhan-nāmopaśikṣya kalāv adharma utkṛṣyamāṇe bhavitavyena vimohitaḥ sva-dharma-patham akuto-bhayam apahāya kupatha-pākhaṇḍam asamañjasaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:345: nija-manīṣayā mandaḥ sampravartayiṣyate BhP_05.06.010/1 yena ha vāva kalau manujāpasadā
GP10bhp_05u:349: brahma-brāhmaṇa-yajña-puruṣa-loka-vidūṣakāḥ prāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti BhP_05.06.011/1 te ca hy
GP10bhp_05u:350: nija-loka-yātrayāndha-paramparayāśvastās tamasy andhe svayam eva prapatiṣyanti BhP_05.06.012/1 ayam avatāro rajasopapluta-kaivalyopaśikṣaṇārthaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:352: BhP_05.06.013/1 aho bhuvaḥ sapta-samudravatyā dvīpeṣu varṣeṣv adhipuṇyam
GP10bhp_05u:354: BhP_05.06.013/2 gāyanti yatratya-janā murāreḥ karmāṇi bhadrāṇy
GP10bhp_05u:356: BhP_05.06.014/1 aho nu vaṃśo yaśasāvadātaḥ praiyavrato yatra pumān purāṇaḥ BhP_05.06.014/2 kṛtāvatāraḥ puruṣaḥ sa ādyaś cacāra dharmaṃ yad
GP10bhp_05u:358: BhP_05.06.015/1 ko nv asya kāṣṭhām aparo 'nugacchen mano-rathenāpy
GP10bhp_05u:359: abhavasya yogī BhP_05.06.015/2 yo yoga-māyāḥ spṛhayaty udastā hy asattayā yena kṛta-prayatnāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:361: parama-guror bhagavata ṛṣabhākhyasya viśuddhācaritam īritaṃ puṃsāṃ samasta-duścaritābhiharaṇaṃ parama-mahā-maṅgalāyanam idam anuśraddhayopacitayānuśṛṇoty āśrāvayati vāvahito bhagavati tasmin vāsudeva ekāntato bhaktir anayor api samanuvartate
GP10bhp_05u:362: BhP_05.06.017/1 yasyām eva kavaya ātmānam avirataṃ vividha-vṛjina-saṃsāra-paritāpopatapyamānam anusavanaṃ snāpayantas tayaiva
GP10bhp_05u:363: parayā nirvṛtyā hy apavargam ātyantikaṃ parama-puruṣārtham api svayam āsāditaṃ no evādriyante bhagavadīyatvenaiva parisamāpta-sarvārthāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:364: BhP_05.06.018/1 rājan patir gurur alaṃ bhavatāṃ yadūnāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:365: BhP_05.06.018/2 daivaṃ priyaḥ kula-patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaro vaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:366: BhP_05.06.018/3 astv evam aṅga bhagavān bhajatāṃ mukundo
GP10bhp_05u:367: BhP_05.06.018/4 muktiṃ dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti-yogam
GP10bhp_05u:371: BhP_05.06.019/4 ākhyān namo bhagavate ṛṣabhāya tasmai BhP_05.07.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
GP10bhp_05u:375: BhP_05.07.002/1 tasyām u ha vā ātmajān kārtsnyenānurūpān ātmanaḥ pañca janayām āsa bhūtādir iva bhūta-sūkṣmāṇi sumatiṃ rāṣṭrabhṛtaṃ sudarśanam
GP10bhp_05u:377: BhP_05.07.003/1 ajanābhaṃ nāmaitad varṣaṃ bhāratam iti yata ārabhya vyapadiśanti BhP_05.07.004/1 sa bahuvin mahī-patiḥ pitṛ-pitāmahavad uru-vatsalatayā sve sve karmaṇi vartamānāḥ prajāḥ sva-dharmam anuvartamānaḥ paryapālayat BhP_05.07.005/1 īje ca bhagavantaṃ yajña-kratu-rūpaṃ kratubhir uccāvacaiḥ śraddhayāhṛtāgnihotra-darśa-pūrṇamāsa-cāturmāsya-paśu-somānāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:379: BhP_05.07.006/1 sampracaratsu nānā-yāgeṣu viracitāṅga-kriyeṣv apūrvaṃ yat tat kriyā-phalaṃ dharmākhyaṃ pare brahmaṇi yajña-puruṣe
GP10bhp_05u:382: ātma-naipuṇya-mṛdita-kaṣāyo haviḥṣv adhvaryubhir gṛhyamāṇeṣu sa yajamāno yajña-bhājo devāṃs tān puruṣāvayaveṣv abhyadhyāyat
GP10bhp_05u:386: upalakṣite nija-puruṣa-hṛl-likhitenātmani puruṣa-rūpeṇa virocamāna uccaistarāṃ bhaktir anudinam
GP10bhp_05u:389: vibhajya svayaṃ sakala-sampan-niketāt sva-niketāt pulahāśramaṃ pravavrāja BhP_05.07.009/1 yatra ha vāva bhagavān harir adyāpi tatratyānāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:393: BhP_05.07.011/1 tasmin vāva kila sa ekalaḥ pulahāśramopavane
GP10bhp_05u:394: vividha-kusuma-kisalaya-tulasikāmbubhiḥ kanda-mūla-phalopahāraiś ca samīhamāno bhagavata ārādhanaṃ vivikta uparata-viṣayābhilāṣa
GP10bhp_05u:401: paripluta-paramāhlāda-gambhīra-hṛdaya-hradāvagāḍha-dhiṣaṇas tām api kriyamāṇāṃ bhagavat-saparyāṃ na sasmāra BhP_05.07.013/1 itthaṃ dhṛta-bhagavad-vrata
GP10bhp_05u:402: aiṇeyājina-vāsasānusavanābhiṣekārdra-kapiśa-kuṭila-jaṭā-kalāpena ca virocamānaḥ sūryarcā bhagavantaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ puruṣam ujjihāne sūrya-maṇḍale
GP10bhp_05u:404: BhP_05.07.014/1 paro-rajaḥ savitur jāta-vedo devasya bhargo manasedaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:406: BhP_05.07.014/2 suretasādaḥ punar āviśya caṣṭe haṃsaṃ gṛdhrāṇaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:410: brahmākṣaram abhigṛṇāno muhūrta-trayam udakānta upaviveśa BhP_05.08.002/1 tatra tadā rājan hariṇī pipāsayā jalāśayābhyāśam
GP10bhp_05u:412: BhP_05.08.003/1 tayā pepīyamāna udake tāvad evāvidūreṇa nadato mṛga-pater
GP10bhp_05u:414: BhP_05.08.004/1 tam upaśrutya sā mṛga-vadhūḥ prakṛti-viklavā
GP10bhp_05u:416: pāriplava-dṛṣṭir agata-tṛṣā bhayāt sahasaivoccakrāma BhP_05.08.005/1 tasyā utpatantyā antarvatnyā
GP10bhp_05u:418: BhP_05.08.006/1 tat-prasavotsarpaṇa-bhaya-khedāturā sva-gaṇena viyujyamānā kasyāñcid daryāṃ kṛṣṇa-sārasatī nipapātātha ca mamāra
GP10bhp_05u:419: BhP_05.08.007/1 taṃ tv eṇa-kuṇakaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ srotasānūhyamānam abhivīkṣyāpaviddhaṃ bandhur ivānukampayā rājarṣir bharata ādāya
GP10bhp_05u:421: BhP_05.08.008/1 tasya ha vā eṇa-kuṇaka uccair etasmin kṛta-nijābhimānasyāhar-ahas
GP10bhp_05u:423: puruṣa-paricaryādaya ekaikaśaḥ katipayenāhar-gaṇena viyujyamānāḥ kila sarva evodavasan BhP_05.08.009/1 aho batāyaṃ hariṇa-kuṇakaḥ kṛpaṇa
GP10bhp_05u:425: parivarjitaḥ śaraṇaṃ ca mopasādito mām eva mātā-pitarau bhrātṛ-jñātīn
GP10bhp_05u:426: yauthikāṃś caivopeyāya nānyaṃ kañcana veda mayy ati-visrabdhaś cāta eva mayā mat-parāyaṇasya poṣaṇa-pālana-prīṇana-lālanam anasūyunānuṣṭheyaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:428: BhP_05.08.010/1 nūnaṃ hy āryāḥ sādhava upaśama-śīlāḥ kṛpaṇa-suhṛda
GP10bhp_05u:433: vṛkasālā-vṛkādibhyo bhayam āśaṃsamāno yadā saha hariṇa-kuṇakena vanaṃ samāviśati BhP_05.08.013/1 pathiṣu ca mugdha-bhāvena tatra tatra viṣakta-mati-praṇaya-bhara-hṛdayaḥ kārpaṇyāt skandhenodvahati evam utsaṅga urasi cādhāyopalālayan mudaṃ paramām avāpa
GP10bhp_05u:434: BhP_05.08.014/1 kriyāyāṃ nirvartyamānāyām antarāle 'py utthāyotthāya yadainam abhicakṣīta tarhi vāva sa varṣa-patiḥ prakṛti-sthena manasā tasmā āśiṣa āśāste svasti stād vatsa te sarvata iti BhP_05.08.015/1 anyadā bhṛśam udvigna-manā naṣṭa-draviṇa iva kṛpaṇaḥ sakaruṇam ati-tarṣeṇa hariṇa-kuṇaka-viraha-vihvala-hṛdaya-santāpas tam evānuśocan kila kaśmalaṃ mahad abhirambhita iti hovāca BhP_05.08.016/1 api bata sa vai kṛpaṇa eṇa-bālako mṛta-hariṇī-suto 'ho
GP10bhp_05u:437: BhP_05.08.017/1 api kṣemeṇāsminn āśramopavane śaṣpāṇi carantaṃ deva-guptaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:439: BhP_05.08.018/1 api ca na vṛkaḥ sālā-vṛko 'nyatamo vā naika-cara eka-caro
GP10bhp_05u:440: vā bhakṣayati BhP_05.08.019/1 nimlocati ha bhagavān sakala-jagat-kṣemodayas
GP10bhp_05u:442: BhP_05.08.020/1 api svid akṛta-sukṛtam āgatya māṃ sukhayiṣyati
GP10bhp_05u:447: BhP_05.08.022/1 āsādita-haviṣi barhiṣi dūṣite mayopālabdho bhīta-bhītaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:449: BhP_05.08.023/1 kiṃ vā are ācaritaṃ tapas tapasvinyānayā yad iyam avaniḥ
GP10bhp_05u:451: draviṇa-vidhurāturasya kṛpaṇasya mama draviṇa-padavīṃ sūcayanty ātmānaṃ ca
GP10bhp_05u:452: sarvataḥ kṛta-kautukaṃ dvijānāṃ svargāpavarga-kāmānāṃ deva-yajanaṃ karoti
GP10bhp_05u:453: BhP_05.08.024/1 api svid asau bhagavān uḍu-patir enaṃ mṛga-pati-bhayān
GP10bhp_05u:459: svadhayatīti ca BhP_05.08.026/1 evam aghaṭamāna-manorathākula-hṛdayo mṛga-dārakābhāsena
GP10bhp_05u:461: bhagavad-ārādhana-lakṣaṇāc ca katham itarathā jāty-antara eṇa-kuṇaka
GP10bhp_05u:465: mṛgārbhaka-poṣaṇa-pālana-prīṇana-lālanānuṣaṅgeṇāvigaṇayata ātmānam ahir ivākhu-bilaṃ duratikramaḥ kālaḥ karāla-rabhasa āpadyata
GP10bhp_05u:466: BhP_05.08.027/1 tadānīm api pārśva-vartinam ātmajam ivānuśocantam abhivīkṣamāṇo mṛga evābhiniveśita-manā visṛjya lokam imaṃ saha mṛgeṇa kalevaraṃ mṛtam anu na mṛta-janmānusmṛtir itaravan mṛga-śarīram avāpa
GP10bhp_05u:467: BhP_05.08.028/1 tatrāpi ha vā ātmano mṛgatva-kāraṇaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:469: BhP_05.08.029/1 aho kaṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭo 'ham ātmavatām anupathād yad-vimukta-samasta-saṅgasya vivikta-puṇyāraṇya-śaraṇasyātmavata ātmani sarveṣām ātmanāṃ bhagavati vāsudeve tad-anuśravaṇa-manana-saṅkīrtanārādhanānusmaraṇābhiyogenāśūnya-sakala-yāmena
GP10bhp_05u:470: kālena samāveśitaṃ samāhitaṃ kārtsnyena manas tat tu punar mamābudhasyārān
GP10bhp_05u:471: mṛga-sutam anu parisusrāva BhP_05.08.030/1 ity evaṃ nigūḍha-nirvedo visṛjya mṛgīṃ mātaraṃ
GP10bhp_05u:473: pulastya-pulahāśramaṃ kālañjarāt pratyājagāma BhP_05.08.031/1 tasminn api kālaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaḥ saṅgāc ca bhṛśam udvigna ātma-sahacaraḥ śuṣka-parṇa-tṛṇa-vīrudhā vartamāno mṛgatva-nimittāvasānam
GP10bhp_05u:478: nava sodaryā aṅgajā babhūvur mithunaṃ ca yavīyasyāṃ bhāryāyām yas tu tatra pumāṃs taṃ parama-bhāgavataṃ rājarṣi-pravaraṃ bharatam
GP10bhp_05u:480: BhP_05.09.002/1 tatrāpi svajana-saṅgāc ca bhṛśam udvijamāno bhagavataḥ
GP10bhp_05u:484: BhP_05.09.003/1 tasyāpi ha vā ātmajasya vipraḥ putra-snehānubaddha-manā
GP10bhp_05u:485: āsamāvartanāt saṃskārān yathopadeśaṃ vidadhāna upanītasya ca punaḥ śaucācamanādīn karma-niyamān anabhipretān api samaśikṣayad anuśiṣṭena hi bhāvyaṃ pituḥ putreṇeti
GP10bhp_05u:486: BhP_05.09.004/1 sa cāpi tad u ha pitṛ-sannidhāv evāsadhrīcīnam iva sma
GP10bhp_05u:487: karoti chandāṃsy adhyāpayiṣyan saha vyāhṛtibhiḥ sapraṇava-śiras tripadīṃ sāvitrīṃ graiṣma-vāsantikān māsān adhīyānam apy asamaveta-rūpaṃ grāhayām āsa BhP_05.09.005/1 evaṃ sva-tanuja ātmany anurāgāveśita-cittaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:489: anabhiyuktāny api samanuśiṣṭena bhāvyam ity asad-āgrahaḥ putram anuśāsya svayaṃ tāvad anadhigata-manorathaḥ kālenāpramattena svayaṃ gṛha eva pramatta upasaṃhṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:490: BhP_05.09.006/1 atha yavīyasī dvija-satī sva-garbha-jātaṃ mithunaṃ sapatnyā upanyasya svayam anusaṃsthayā patilokam agāt
GP10bhp_05u:491: BhP_05.09.007/1 pitary uparate bhrātara enam atat-prabhāva-vidas trayyāṃ vidyāyām eva paryavasita-matayo na para-vidyāyāṃ jaḍa-matir iti bhrātur anuśāsana-nirbandhān nyavṛtsanta
GP10bhp_05u:493: unmatta-jaḍa-badhira-mūkety abhibhāṣyamāṇo yadā tad-anurūpāṇi prabhāṣate karmāṇi ca kāryamāṇaḥ parecchayā karoti viṣṭito vetanato vā yācñyā yadṛcchayā vopasāditam alpaṃ bahu mṛṣṭaṃ kadannaṃ vābhyavaharati paraṃ
GP10bhp_05u:500: dvijātir iti brahma-bandhur iti saṃjñayātaj-jñajanāvamato vicacāra
GP10bhp_05u:501: BhP_05.09.011/1 yadā tu parata āhāraṃ karma-vetanata īhamānaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:502: sva-bhrātṛbhir api kedāra-karmaṇi nirūpitas tad api karoti kintu na samaṃ viṣamaṃ nyūnam adhikam iti veda
GP10bhp_05u:504: BhP_05.09.012/1 atha kadācit kaścid vṛṣala-patir bhadra-kālyai
GP10bhp_05u:506: BhP_05.09.013/1 tasya ha daiva-muktasya paśoḥ padavīṃ tad-anucarāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:508: ākasmikena vidhinā kedārān vīrāsanena mṛga-varāhādibhyaḥ saṃrakṣamāṇam
GP10bhp_05u:510: BhP_05.09.014/1 atha ta enam anavadya-lakṣaṇam avamṛśya
GP10bhp_05u:511: bhartṛ-karma-niṣpattiṃ manyamānā baddhvā raśanayā caṇḍikā-gṛham upaninyur mudā vikasit a-vadanāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:512: BhP_05.09.015/1 atha paṇayas taṃ sva-vidhinābhiṣicyāhatena vāsasācchādya
GP10bhp_05u:516: BhP_05.09.016/1 atha vṛṣala-rāja-paṇiḥ puruṣa-paśor asṛg-āsavena devīṃ
GP10bhp_05u:517: bhadra-kālīṃ yakṣyamāṇas tad-abhimantritam asim ati-karāla-niśitam upādade
GP10bhp_05u:522: sarva-bhūta-suhṛdaḥ sūnāyām apy ananumatam ālambhanaṃ tad upalabhya
GP10bhp_05u:523: brahma-tejasāti-durviṣaheṇa dandahyamānena vapuṣā sahasoccacāṭa saiva devī bhadra-kālī
GP10bhp_05u:526: hantu-kāmevedaṃ mahāṭṭa-hāsam ati-saṃrambheṇa vimuñcantī tata utpatya
GP10bhp_05u:527: pāpīyasāṃ duṣṭānāṃ tenaivāsinā vivṛkṇa-śīrṣṇāṃ galāt sravantam asṛg-āsavam
GP10bhp_05u:529: saha jagau nanarta ca vijahāra ca śiraḥ-kanduka-līlayā
GP10bhp_05u:530: BhP_05.09.019/1 evam eva khalu mahad-abhicārāti-kramaḥ kārtsnyenātmane phalati BhP_05.09.020/1 na vā etad viṣṇudatta mahad-adbhutaṃ yad asambhramaḥ sva-śiraś-chedana āpatite 'pi
GP10bhp_05u:532: sarva-sattva-suhṛd-ātmanāṃ nirvairāṇāṃ sākṣād bhagavatānimiṣāri-varāyudhenāpramattena tais tair bhāvaiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:536: BhP_05.10.001/1 atha sindhu-sauvīra-pate rahūgaṇasya vrajata ikṣumatyās
GP10bhp_05u:537: taṭe tat-kula-patinā śibikā-vāha-puruṣānveṣaṇa-samaye daivenopasāditaḥ sa dvija-vara upalabdha eṣa pīvā yuvā saṃhananāṅgo go-kharavad dhuraṃ voḍhum alam iti pūrva-viṣṭi-gṛhītaiḥ saha gṛhītaḥ prasabham atad-arha uvāha śibikāṃ sa mahānubhāvaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:538: BhP_05.10.002/1 yadā hi dvija-varasyeṣu-mātrāvalokānugater na samāhitā puruṣa-gatis tadā viṣama-gatāṃ sva-śibikāṃ rahūgaṇa upadhārya puruṣān
GP10bhp_05u:539: adhivahata āha he voḍhāraḥ sādhv atikramata kim iti viṣamam uhyate yānam iti
GP10bhp_05u:540: BhP_05.10.003/1 atha ta īśvara-vacaḥ sopālambham upākarṇyopāya-turīyāc
GP10bhp_05u:542: BhP_05.10.004/1 na vayaṃ nara-deva pramattā bhavan-niyamānupathāḥ sādhv eva vahāmaḥ ayam adhunaiva niyukto 'pi na drutaṃ vrajati nānena saha voḍhum u ha vayaṃ pārayāma iti
GP10bhp_05u:543: BhP_05.10.005/1 sāṃsargiko doṣa eva nūnam ekasyāpi sarveṣāṃ sāṃsargikāṇāṃ bhavitum arhatīti niścitya niśamya kṛpaṇa-vaco rājā rahūgaṇa upāsita-vṛddho 'pi nisargeṇa balāt kṛta īṣad-utthita-manyur
GP10bhp_05u:545: BhP_05.10.006/1 aho kaṣṭaṃ bhrātar vyaktam uru-pariśrānto dīrgham adhvānam eka eva ūhivān suciraṃ nāti-pīvā na saṃhananāṅgo jarasā copadruto bhavān sakhe no evāpara ete saṅghaṭṭina iti bahu-vipralabdho 'py avidyayā
GP10bhp_05u:547: 'haṃ mamety anadhyāropita-mithyā-pratyayo brahma-bhūtas tūṣṇīṃ śibikāṃ pūrvavad uvāha BhP_05.10.007/1 atha punaḥ sva-śibikāyāṃ viṣama-gatāyāṃ prakupita uvāca rahūgaṇaḥ kim idam are tvaṃ jīvan-mṛto māṃ kadarthī-kṛtya bhartṛ-śāsanam
GP10bhp_05u:548: aticarasi pramattasya ca te karomi cikitsāṃ daṇḍa-pāṇir iva janatāyā yathā
GP10bhp_05u:550: BhP_05.10.008/1 evaṃ bahv abaddham api bhāṣamāṇaṃ nara-devābhimānaṃ rajasā tamasānuviddhena madena tiraskṛtāśeṣa-bhagavat-priya-niketaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:552: yogeśvara-caryāyāṃ nāti-vyutpanna-matiṃ smayamāna iva vigata-smaya idam āha BhP_05.10.009/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca BhP_05.10.009/1 tvayoditaṃ vyaktam avipralabdhaṃ bhartuḥ sa me syād yadi vīra bhāraḥ BhP_05.10.009/2 gantur yadi syād adhigamyam adhvā pīveti rāśau na vidāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:554: BhP_05.10.010/1 sthaulyaṃ kārśyaṃ vyādhaya ādhayaś ca kṣut tṛḍ bhayaṃ kalir icchā jarā
GP10bhp_05u:555: BhP_05.10.010/2 nidrā ratir manyur ahaṃ madaḥ śuco dehena jātasya hi me na santi
GP10bhp_05u:556: BhP_05.10.011/1 jīvan-mṛtatvaṃ niyamena rājan ādyantavad yad vikṛtasya dṛṣṭam
GP10bhp_05u:557: BhP_05.10.011/2 sva-svāmya-bhāvo dhruva īḍya yatra tarhy ucyate 'sau
GP10bhp_05u:559: BhP_05.10.012/1 viśeṣa-buddher vivaraṃ manāk ca paśyāma yan na vyavahārato
GP10bhp_05u:561: BhP_05.10.012/2 ka īśvaras tatra kim īśitavyaṃ tathāpi rājan karavāma kiṃ
GP10bhp_05u:563: BhP_05.10.013/1 unmatta-matta-jaḍavat sva-saṃsthāṃ gatasya me vīra
GP10bhp_05u:565: BhP_05.10.013/2 arthaḥ kiyān bhavatā śikṣitena stabdha-pramattasya ca piṣṭapeṣaḥ BhP_05.10.014/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
GP10bhp_05u:568: rāja-yānam api tathovāha BhP_05.10.015/1 sa cāpi pāṇḍaveya sindhu-sauvīra-patis tattva-jijñāsāyāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:572: BhP_05.10.016/1 kas tvaṃ nigūḍhaś carasi dvijānāṃ bibharṣi sūtraṃ katamo 'vadhūtaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:573: BhP_05.10.016/2 kasyāsi kutratya ihāpi kasmāt kṣemāya naś ced asi nota
GP10bhp_05u:575: BhP_05.10.017/1 nāhaṃ viśaṅke sura-rāja-vajrān na tryakṣa-śūlān na yamasya daṇḍāt
GP10bhp_05u:577: BhP_05.10.018/1 tad brūhy asaṅgo jaḍavan nigūḍha- vijñāna-vīryo vicarasy apāraḥ BhP_05.10.018/2 vacāṃsi yoga-grathitāni sādho na naḥ kṣamante manasāpi bhettum
GP10bhp_05u:578: BhP_05.10.019/1 ahaṃ ca yogeśvaram ātma-tattva- vidāṃ munīnāṃ paramaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:579: guruṃ vai BhP_05.10.019/2 praṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ kim ihāraṇaṃ tat sākṣād dhariṃ
GP10bhp_05u:581: BhP_05.10.020/1 sa vai bhavā loka-nirīkṣaṇārtham avyakta-liṅgo vicaraty api svit
GP10bhp_05u:582: BhP_05.10.020/2 yogeśvarāṇāṃ gatim andha-buddhiḥ kathaṃ vicakṣīta gṛhānubandhaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:583: BhP_05.10.021/1 dṛṣṭaḥ śramaḥ karmata ātmano vai bhartur gantur bhavataś cānumanye
GP10bhp_05u:589: BhP_05.10.023/1 śāstābhigoptā nṛpatiḥ prajānāṃ yaḥ kiṅkaro vai na pinaṣṭi piṣṭam
GP10bhp_05u:590: BhP_05.10.023/2 sva-dharmam ārādhanam acyutasya yad īhamāno vijahāty aghaugham
GP10bhp_05u:591: BhP_05.10.024/1 tan me bhavān nara-devābhimāna- madena
GP10bhp_05u:593: BhP_05.10.024/2 kṛṣīṣṭa maitrī-dṛśam ārta-bandho yathā tare sad-avadhyānam
GP10bhp_05u:595: BhP_05.10.025/1 na vikriyā viśva-suhṛt-sakhasya sāmyena vītābhimates tavāpi
GP10bhp_05u:596: BhP_05.10.025/2 mahad-vimānāt sva-kṛtād dhi mādṛṅ naṅkṣyaty adūrād api śūlapāṇiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:597: BhP_05.11.001/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca BhP_05.11.001/1 akovidaḥ kovida-vāda-vādān vadasy atho nāti-vidāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:599: BhP_05.11.001/2 na sūrayo hi vyavahāram enaṃ tattvāvamarśena sahāmananti
GP10bhp_05u:602: BhP_05.11.002/2 na veda-vādeṣu hi tattva-vādaḥ prāyeṇa śuddho nu cakāsti sādhuḥ BhP_05.11.003/1 na tasya tattva-grahaṇāya sākṣād varīyasīr api vācaḥ samāsan BhP_05.11.003/2 svapne niruktyā gṛhamedhi-saukhyaṃ na yasya heyānumitaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:603: svayaṃ syāt BhP_05.11.004/1 yāvan mano rajasā pūruṣasya sattvena vā tamasā vānuruddham BhP_05.11.004/2 cetobhir ākūtibhir ātanoti niraṅkuśaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaraṃ vā
GP10bhp_05u:604: BhP_05.11.005/1 sa vāsanātmā viṣayoparakto guṇa-pravāho vikṛtaḥ ṣoḍaśātmā BhP_05.11.005/2 bibhrat pṛthaṅ-nāmabhi rūpa-bhedam antar-bahiṣṭvaṃ ca purais tanoti
GP10bhp_05u:605: BhP_05.11.006/1 duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vyatiriktaṃ ca tīvraṃ kālopapannaṃ phalam āvyanakti BhP_05.11.006/2 āliṅgya māyā-racitāntarātmā sva-dehinaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:607: BhP_05.11.007/1 tāvān ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ sadāviḥ kṣetrajña-sākṣyo bhavati
GP10bhp_05u:609: BhP_05.11.007/2 tasmān mano liṅgam ado vadanti guṇāguṇatvasya parāvarasya
GP10bhp_05u:610: BhP_05.11.008/1 guṇānuraktaṃ vyasanāya jantoḥ kṣemāya nairguṇyam atho
GP10bhp_05u:611: manaḥ syāt BhP_05.11.008/2 yathā pradīpo ghṛta-vartim aśnan śikhāḥ sadhūmā bhajati hy anyadā svam BhP_05.11.008/3 padaṃ tathā guṇa-karmānubaddhaṃ vṛttīr manaḥ śrayate
GP10bhp_05u:613: BhP_05.11.009/1 ekādaśāsan manaso hi vṛttaya ākūtayaḥ pañca dhiyo
GP10bhp_05u:615: BhP_05.11.009/2 mātrāṇi karmāṇi puraṃ ca tāsāṃ vadanti haikādaśa vīra bhūmīḥ
GP10bhp_05u:618: BhP_05.11.010/2 ekādaśaṃ svīkaraṇaṃ mameti śayyām ahaṃ dvādaśam eka āhuḥ BhP_05.11.011/1 dravya-svabhāvāśaya-karma-kālair ekādaśāmī manaso vikārāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:619: BhP_05.11.011/2 sahasraśaḥ śataśaḥ koṭiśaś ca kṣetrajñato na mitho na svataḥ syuḥ BhP_05.11.012/1 kṣetrajña etā manaso vibhūtīr jīvasya māyā-racitasya
GP10bhp_05u:621: BhP_05.11.012/2 āvirhitāḥ kvāpi tirohitāś ca śuddho vicaṣṭe hy
GP10bhp_05u:623: BhP_05.11.013/1 kṣetrajña ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ sākṣāt svayaṃ jyotir ajaḥ pareśaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:624: BhP_05.11.013/2 nārāyaṇo bhagavān vāsudevaḥ sva-māyayātmany avadhīyamānaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:625: BhP_05.11.014/1 yathānilaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgamānām ātma-svarūpeṇa niviṣṭa īśet BhP_05.11.014/2 evaṃ paro bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kṣetrajña ātmedam
GP10bhp_05u:627: BhP_05.11.015/1 na yāvad etāṃ tanu-bhṛn narendra vidhūya māyāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:629: BhP_05.11.015/2 vimukta-saṅgo jita-ṣaṭ-sapatno vedātma-tattvaṃ bhramatīha tāvat BhP_05.11.016/1 na yāvad etan mana ātma-liṅgaṃ saṃsāra-tāpāvapanaṃ janasya
GP10bhp_05u:630: BhP_05.11.016/2 yac choka-mohāmaya-rāga-lobha- vairānubandhaṃ mamatāṃ vidhatte
GP10bhp_05u:631: BhP_05.11.017/1 bhrātṛvyam enaṃ tad adabhra-vīryam upekṣayādhyedhitam apramattaḥ BhP_05.11.017/2 guror hareś caraṇopāsanāstro jahi vyalīkaṃ svayam
GP10bhp_05u:633: BhP_05.12.001/0 rahūgaṇa uvāca BhP_05.12.001/1 namo namaḥ kāraṇa-vigrahāya svarūpa-tucchīkṛta-vigrahāya
GP10bhp_05u:636: BhP_05.12.002/1 jvarāmayārtasya yathāgadaṃ sat nidāgha-dagdhasya yathā himāmbhaḥ BhP_05.12.002/2 kudeha-mānāhi-vidaṣṭa-dṛṣṭeḥ brahman vacas te 'mṛtam
GP10bhp_05u:637: auṣadhaṃ me BhP_05.12.003/1 tasmād bhavantaṃ mama saṃśayārthaṃ prakṣyāmi paścād adhunā subodham BhP_05.12.003/2 adhyātma-yoga-grathitaṃ tavoktam ākhyāhi kautūhala-cetaso
GP10bhp_05u:639: BhP_05.12.004/1 yad āha yogeśvara dṛśyamānaṃ kriyā-phalaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:641: BhP_05.12.004/2 na hy añjasā tattva-vimarśanāya bhavān amuṣmin bhramate
GP10bhp_05u:642: mano me BhP_05.12.005/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca BhP_05.12.005/1 ayaṃ jano nāma calan pṛthivyāṃ yaḥ pārthivaḥ pārthiva kasya hetoḥ BhP_05.12.005/2 tasyāpi cāṅghryor adhi gulpha-jaṅghā-
GP10bhp_05u:644: BhP_05.12.006/1 aṃse 'dhi dārvī śibikā ca yasyāṃ sauvīra-rājety apadeśa āste BhP_05.12.006/2 yasmin bhavān rūḍha-nijābhimāno rājāsmi sindhuṣv iti
GP10bhp_05u:646: BhP_05.12.007/1 śocyān imāṃs tvam adhikaṣṭa-dīnān viṣṭyā nigṛhṇan niranugraho 'si
GP10bhp_05u:647: BhP_05.12.007/2 janasya goptāsmi vikatthamāno na śobhase vṛddha-sabhāsu
GP10bhp_05u:649: BhP_05.12.008/1 yadā kṣitāv eva carācarasya vidāma niṣṭhāṃ prabhavaṃ ca nityam
GP10bhp_05u:652: BhP_05.12.009/1 evaṃ niruktaṃ kṣiti-śabda-vṛttam asan nidhānāt paramāṇavo
GP10bhp_05u:654: BhP_05.12.009/2 avidyayā manasā kalpitās te yeṣāṃ samūhena kṛto viśeṣaḥ BhP_05.12.010/1 evaṃ kṛśaṃ sthūlam aṇur bṛhad yad asac ca saj jīvam ajīvam anyat
GP10bhp_05u:656: BhP_05.12.011/1 jñānaṃ viśuddhaṃ paramārtham ekam anantaraṃ tv abahir brahma satyam
GP10bhp_05u:657: BhP_05.12.011/2 pratyak praśāntaṃ bhagavac-chabda-saṃjñaṃ yad vāsudevaṃ kavayo vadanti BhP_05.12.012/1 rahūgaṇaitat tapasā na yāti na cejyayā nirvapaṇād gṛhād vā
GP10bhp_05u:658: BhP_05.12.012/2 na cchandasā naiva jalāgni-sūryair vinā
GP10bhp_05u:662: BhP_05.12.013/2 niṣevyamāṇo 'nudinaṃ mumukṣor matiṃ satīṃ yacchati vāsudeve BhP_05.12.014/1 ahaṃ purā bharato nāma rājā vimukta-dṛṣṭa-śruta-saṅga-bandhaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:663: BhP_05.12.014/2 ārādhanaṃ bhagavata īhamāno mṛgo 'bhavaṃ mṛga-saṅgād
GP10bhp_05u:665: BhP_05.12.015/1 sā māṃ smṛtir mṛga-dehe 'pi vīra kṛṣṇārcana-prabhavā no jahāti BhP_05.12.015/2 atho ahaṃ jana-saṅgād asaṅgo viśaṅkamāno 'vivṛtaś carāmi
GP10bhp_05u:668: BhP_05.12.016/2 hariṃ tad-īhā-kathana-śrutābhyāṃ labdha-smṛtir yāty atipāram adhvanaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:669: BhP_05.13.001/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca BhP_05.13.001/1 duratyaye 'dhvany ajayā niveśito rajas-tamaḥ-sattva-vibhakta-karmadṛk
GP10bhp_05u:670: BhP_05.13.001/2 sa eṣa sārtho 'rtha-paraḥ paribhraman bhavāṭavīṃ yāti na śarma vindati

GP10bhp_05u:675: BhP_05.13.004/1 nivāsa-toya-draviṇātma-buddhis tatas tato dhāvati bho aṭavyām BhP_05.13.004/2 kvacic ca vātyotthita-pāṃsu-dhūmrā diśo na jānāti
GP10bhp_05u:680: abhidhāvati kvacit BhP_05.13.006/1 kvacid vitoyāḥ sarito 'bhiyāti parasparaṃ cālaṣate nirandhaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:681: BhP_05.13.006/2 āsādya dāvaṃ kvacid agni-tapto nirvidyate kva ca yakṣair hṛtāsuḥ BhP_05.13.007/1 śūrair hṛta-svaḥ kva ca nirviṇṇa-cetāḥ śocan vimuhyann upayāti kaśmalam BhP_05.13.007/2 kvacic ca gandharva-puraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pramodate nirvṛtavan
GP10bhp_05u:683: BhP_05.13.008/1 calan kvacit kaṇṭaka-śarkarāṅghrir nagārurukṣur vimanā ivāste
GP10bhp_05u:684: BhP_05.13.008/2 pade pade 'bhyantara-vahninārditaḥ kauṭumbikaḥ krudhyati vai janāya BhP_05.13.009/1 kvacin nigīrṇo 'jagarāhinā jano nāvaiti kiñcid vipine
GP10bhp_05u:686: BhP_05.13.009/2 daṣṭaḥ sma śete kva ca danda-śūkair andho 'ndha-kūpe
GP10bhp_05u:687: patitas tamisre BhP_05.13.010/1 karhi sma cit kṣudra-rasān vicinvaṃs tan-makṣikābhir
GP10bhp_05u:688: vyathito vimānaḥ BhP_05.13.010/2 tatrāti-kṛcchrāt pratilabdhamāno balād vilumpanty atha taṃ tato 'nye
GP10bhp_05u:689: BhP_05.13.011/1 kvacic ca śītātapa-vāta-varṣa- pratikriyāṃ kartum anīśa
GP10bhp_05u:691: BhP_05.13.011/2 kvacin mitho vipaṇan yac ca kiñcid vidveṣam ṛcchaty uta
GP10bhp_05u:693: BhP_05.13.012/1 kvacit kvacit kṣīṇa-dhanas tu tasmin śayyāsana-sthāna-vihāra-hīnaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:694: BhP_05.13.012/2 yācan parād apratilabdha-kāmaḥ pārakya-dṛṣṭir labhate
GP10bhp_05u:696: BhP_05.13.013/1 anyonya-vitta-vyatiṣaṅga-vṛddha- vairānubandho vivahan mithaś ca BhP_05.13.013/2 adhvany amuṣminn uru-kṛcchra-vitta- bādhopasargair viharan vipannaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:697: BhP_05.13.014/1 tāṃs tān vipannān sa hi tatra tatra vihāya jātaṃ parigṛhya sārthaḥ BhP_05.13.014/2 āvartate 'dyāpi na kaścid atra vīrādhvanaḥ pāram upaiti
GP10bhp_05u:699: BhP_05.13.015/1 manasvino nirjita-dig-gajendrā mameti sarve bhuvi
GP10bhp_05u:701: BhP_05.13.015/2 mṛdhe śayīran na tu tad vrajanti yan nyasta-daṇḍo
GP10bhp_05u:705: BhP_05.13.016/2 kvacit kadācid dhari-cakratas trasan sakhyaṃ vidhatte
GP10bhp_05u:707: BhP_05.13.017/1 tair vañcito haṃsa-kulaṃ samāviśann arocayan śīlam upaiti vānarān BhP_05.13.017/2 taj-jāti-rāsena sunirvṛtendriyaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:709: BhP_05.13.018/1 drumeṣu raṃsyan suta-dāra-vatsalo vyavāya-dīno vivaśaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:711: BhP_05.13.018/2 kvacit pramādād giri-kandare patan vallīṃ gṛhītvā
GP10bhp_05u:713: BhP_05.13.019/1 ataḥ kathañcit sa vimukta āpadaḥ punaś ca sārthaṃ praviśaty arindama BhP_05.13.019/2 adhvany amuṣminn ajayā niveśito bhramañ jano 'dyāpi na veda kaścana
GP10bhp_05u:714: BhP_05.13.020/1 rahūgaṇa tvam api hy adhvano 'sya sannyasta-daṇḍaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:716: BhP_05.13.020/2 asaj-jitātmā hari-sevayā śitaṃ jñānāsim ādāya tarāti-pāram
GP10bhp_05u:718: BhP_05.13.021/1 aho nṛ-janmākhila-janma-śobhanaṃ kiṃ janmabhis tv aparair apy amuṣmin
GP10bhp_05u:719: BhP_05.13.021/2 na yad dhṛṣīkeśa-yaśaḥ-kṛtātmanāṃ mahātmanāṃ vaḥ pracuraḥ
GP10bhp_05u:721: BhP_05.13.022/1 na hy adbhutaṃ tvac-caraṇābja-reṇubhir hatāṃhaso bhaktir adhokṣaje 'malā
GP10bhp_05u:722: BhP_05.13.022/2 mauhūrtikād yasya samāgamāc ca me dustarka-mūlo 'pahato
GP10bhp_05u:724: BhP_05.13.023/1 namo mahadbhyo 'stu namaḥ śiśubhyo namo yuvabhyo nama āvaṭubhyaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:725: BhP_05.13.023/2 ye brāhmaṇā gām avadhūta-liṅgāś caranti tebhyaḥ śivam astu rājñām BhP_05.13.024/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
GP10bhp_05u:726: BhP_05.13.024/1 ity evam uttarā-mātaḥ sa vai brahmarṣi-sutaḥ sindhu-pataya
GP10bhp_05u:728: rahūgaṇena sakaruṇam abhivandita-caraṇa āpūrṇārṇava iva nibhṛta-karaṇormy-āśayo dharaṇim imāṃ vicacāra
GP10bhp_05u:730: ātmany avidyādhyāropitāṃ ca dehātma-matiṃ visasarja evaṃ hi nṛpa

GP10bhp_05u:736: BhP_05.14.001/0 sa hovāca BhP_05.14.001/1 sa eṣa dehātma-mānināṃ
GP10bhp_05u:739: tasmin durgādhvavad asugame 'dhvany āpatita īśvarasya bhagavato viṣṇor
GP10bhp_05u:744: BhP_05.14.002/1 yasyām u ha vā ete ṣaḍ-indriya-nāmānaḥ karmaṇā dasyava eva

GP10bhp_05u:750: BhP_05.14.004/1 yathā hy anuvatsaraṃ kṛṣyamāṇam apy adagdha-bījaṃ kṣetraṃ punar evāvapana-kāle gulma-tṛṇa-vīrudbhir gahvaram iva bhavaty evam eva gṛhāśramaḥ karma-kṣetraṃ yasmin na hi karmāṇy utsīdanti yad ayaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:751: kāma-karaṇḍa eṣa āvasathaḥ BhP_05.14.005/1 tatra gato daṃśa-maśaka-samāpasadair manujaiḥ

GP10bhp_05u:753: uparakta-manasānupapannārthaṃ nara-lokaṃ gandharva-nagaram upapannam iti mithyā-dṛṣṭir
GP10bhp_05u:754: BhP_05.14.006/1 tatra ca kvacid ātapodaka-nibhān viṣayān upadhāvati pāna-bhojana-vyavāyādi-vyasana-lolupaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:758: BhP_05.14.008/1 atha kadācin nivāsa-pānīya-draviṇādy-anekātmopajīvanābhiniveśa etasyāṃ saṃsārāṭavyām itas tataḥ paridhāvati
GP10bhp_05u:759: BhP_05.14.009/1 kvacic ca vātyaupamyayā pramadayāroham āropitas tat-kāla-rajasā rajanī-bhūta ivāsādhu-maryādo rajas-valākṣo 'pi dig-devatā
GP10bhp_05u:760: atirajas-vala-matir na vijānāti BhP_05.14.010/1 kvacit sakṛd avagata-viṣaya-vaitathyaḥ svayaṃ parābhidhyānena vibhraṃśita-smṛtis tayaiva marīci-toya-prāyāṃs tān evābhidhāvati BhP_05.14.011/1 kvacid ulūka-jhillī-svanavad ati-paruṣa-rabhasāṭopaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:768: BhP_05.14.014/1 yadā tu para-bādhayāndha ātmane nopanamati tadā hi

GP10bhp_05u:770: BhP_05.14.015/1 kvacid āsādya gṛhaṃ dāvavat priyārtha-vidhuram
GP10bhp_05u:771: asukhodarkaṃ śokāgninā dahyamāno bhṛśaṃ nirvedam upagacchati
