GP10bhp_05u:778: BhP_05.14.019/1 kvacic ca duḥsahena kāyābhyantara-vahninā gṛhīta-sāraḥ
GP10bhp_05u:780: BhP_05.14.020/1 sa eva punar nidrājagara-gṛhīto 'ndhe tamasi magnaḥ śūnyāraṇya iva śete nānyat-kiñcana veda śava ivāpaviddhaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:784: BhP_05.14.022/1 karhi sma cit kāma-madhu-lavān vicinvan yadā para-dāra-para-drav-yāṇy avarundhāno rājñā svāmibhir vā nihataḥ pataty
GP10bhp_05u:785: apāre niraye BhP_05.14.023/1 atha ca tasmād ubhayathāpi hi karmāsminn ātmanaḥ saṃsārāvapanam
GP10bhp_05u:786: BhP_05.14.024/1 muktas tato yadi bandhād devadatta upācchinatti tasmād api viṣṇumitra ity
GP10bhp_05u:788: daśānāṃ pratinivāraṇe 'kalpo duranta-cintayā viṣaṇṇa āste BhP_05.14.026/1 kvacin mitho vyavaharan yat kiñcid dhanam anyebhyo vā kākiṇikā-mātram apy apaharan yat kiñcid vā vidveṣam eti vitta-śāṭhyāt
GP10bhp_05u:789: BhP_05.14.027/1 adhvany amuṣminn ima upasargās tathā sukha-duḥkha-rāga-dveṣa-bhayābhimāna-pramādonmāda-śoka-moha-lobha-mātsaryerṣyāva-māna-kṣut-pipāsādhi-vyādhi-janma-jarā-maraṇādayaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:793: ātmānam ajitātmāpāre 'ndhe tamasi prahiṇoti BhP_05.14.029/1 kadācid īśvarasya bhagavato viṣṇoś cakrāt paramāṇv-ādi-dvi-parārdhāpavarga-kālopalakṣaṇāt parivartitena vayasā raṃhasā harata ābrahma-tṛṇa-stambādīnāṃ bhūtānām animiṣato miṣatāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:794: vitrasta-hṛdayas tam eveśvaraṃ kāla-cakra-nijāyudhaṃ sākṣād bhagavantaṃ yajña-puruṣam anādṛtya pākhaṇḍa-devatāḥ kaṅka-gṛdhra-baka-vaṭa-prāyā
GP10bhp_05u:796: BhP_05.14.030/1 yadā pākhaṇḍibhir ātma-vañcitais tair uru vañcito
GP10bhp_05u:799: yajña-puruṣasyārādhanam eva tad arocayan śūdra-kulaṃ bhajate nigamācāre 'śuddhito yasya mithunī-bhāvaḥ kuṭumba-bharaṇaṃ yathā vānara-jāteḥ
GP10bhp_05u:800: BhP_05.14.031/1 tatrāpi niravarodhaḥ svaireṇa viharann ati-kṛpaṇa-buddhir
GP10bhp_05u:802: BhP_05.14.032/1 kvacid drumavad aihikārtheṣu gṛheṣu raṃsyan yathā vānaraḥ
GP10bhp_05u:804: BhP_05.14.033/1 evam adhvany avarundhāno mṛtyu-gaja-bhayāt tamasi
GP10bhp_05u:808: BhP_05.14.035/1 kvacin mitho vyavaharan yat kiñcid dhanam upayāti
GP10bhp_05u:815: āpanna-vipanno yatra yas tam u ha vāvetaras tatra visṛjya jātaṃ jātam upādāya śocan muhyan bibhyad-vivadan krandan saṃhṛṣyan gāyan nahyamānaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:816: sādhu-varjito naivāvartate 'dyāpi yata ārabdha eṣa nara-loka-sārtho yam adhvanaḥ pāram upadiśanti
GP10bhp_05u:817: BhP_05.14.039/1 yad idaṃ yogānuśāsanaṃ na vā etad avarundhate yan nyasta-daṇḍā munaya upaśama-śīlā uparatātmānaḥ samavagacchanti BhP_05.14.040/1 yad api dig-ibha-jayino yajvino ye vai rājarṣayaḥ kiṃ tu
GP10bhp_05u:818: paraṃ mṛdhe śayīrann asyām eva mameyam iti kṛta-vairānubandhāyāṃ visṛjya svayam upasaṃhṛtāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:819: BhP_05.14.041/1 karma-vallīm avalambya tata āpadaḥ kathañcin narakād vimuktaḥ punar apy evaṃ saṃsārādhvani vartamāno nara-loka-sārtham upayāti evam upari gato 'pi
GP10bhp_05u:823: BhP_05.14.043/1 yo dustyajān dāra-sutān suhṛd rājyaṃ hṛdi-spṛśaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:827: BhP_05.14.044/3 naicchan nṛpas tad-ucitaṃ mahatāṃ madhudviṭ-
GP10bhp_05u:831: BhP_05.14.045/3 nārāyaṇāya haraye nama ity udāraṃ BhP_05.14.045/4 hāsyan mṛgatvam api yaḥ samudājahāra BhP_05.14.046/1 ya idaṃ bhāgavata-sabhājitāvadāta-guṇa-karmaṇo rājarṣer bharatasyānucaritaṃ svasty-ayanam āyuṣyaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:832: svargyāpavargyaṃ vānuśṛṇoty ākhyāsyaty abhinandati ca sarvā evāśiṣa ātmana āśāste na kāñcana parata iti BhP_05.15.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
GP10bhp_05u:833: BhP_05.15.001/1 bharatasyātmajaḥ sumatir nāmābhihito yam u ha vāva kecit pākhaṇḍina ṛṣabha-padavīm anuvartamānaṃ cānāryā aveda-samāmnātāṃ devatāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:836: BhP_05.15.003/1 athāsuryāṃ tat-tanayo devadyumnas tato dhenumatyāṃ sutaḥ parameṣṭhī tasya suvarcalāyāṃ pratīha upajātaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:837: BhP_05.15.004/1 ya ātma-vidyām ākhyāya svayaṃ saṃśuddho mahā-puruṣam
GP10bhp_05u:839: BhP_05.15.005/1 pratīhāt suvarcalāyāṃ pratihartrādayas traya āsann ijyā-kovidāḥ sūnavaḥ pratihartuḥ stutyām aja-bhūmānāv ajaniṣātām
GP10bhp_05u:840: BhP_05.15.006/1 bhūmna ṛṣikulyāyām udgīthas tataḥ prastāvo devakulyāyāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:841: prastāvān niyutsāyāṃ hṛdayaja āsīd vibhur vibho ratyāṃ ca pṛthuṣeṇas tasmān nakta ākūtyāṃ jajñe naktād druti-putro gayo rājarṣi-pravara
GP10bhp_05u:842: udāra-śravā ajāyata sākṣād bhagavato viṣṇor jagad-rirakṣiṣayā
GP10bhp_05u:845: prajā-pālana-poṣaṇa-prīṇanopalālanānuśāsana-lakṣaṇenejyādinā ca bhagavati mahā-puruṣe parāvare brahmaṇi sarvātmanārpita-paramārtha-lakṣaṇena
GP10bhp_05u:849: BhP_05.15.008/1 tasyemāṃ gāthāṃ pāṇḍaveya purāvida upagāyanti BhP_05.15.009/1 gayaṃ nṛpaḥ kaḥ pratiyāti karmabhir yajvābhimānī bahuvid
GP10bhp_05u:853: BhP_05.15.010/1 yam abhyaṣiñcan parayā mudā satīḥ satyāśiṣo dakṣa-kanyāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:855: BhP_05.15.010/2 yasya prajānāṃ duduhe dharāśiṣo nirāśiṣo guṇa-vatsa-snutodhāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:856: BhP_05.15.011/1 chandāṃsy akāmasya ca yasya kāmān dudūhur ājahrur atho baliṃ nṛpāḥ BhP_05.15.011/2 pratyañcitā yudhi dharmeṇa viprā yadāśiṣāṃ ṣaṣṭham aṃśaṃ paretya BhP_05.15.012/1 yasyādhvare bhagavān adhvarātmā maghoni mādyaty uru-soma-pīthe
GP10bhp_05u:861: BhP_05.15.013/2 prīyeta sadyaḥ sa ha viśva-jīvaḥ prītaḥ svayaṃ prītim agād gayasya BhP_05.15.014/1 gayād gayantyāṃ citrarathaḥ sugatir avarodhana iti trayaḥ putrā babhūvuś citrarathād ūrṇāyāṃ samrāḍ ajaniṣṭa tata utkalāyāṃ marīcir marīcer bindumatyāṃ bindum ānudapadyata tasmāt saraghāyāṃ madhur nāmābhavan madhoḥ sumanasi vīravratas tato bhojāyāṃ manthu-pramanthū
GP10bhp_05u:862: jajñāte manthoḥ satyāyāṃ bhauvanas tato dūṣaṇāyāṃ tvaṣṭājaniṣṭa tvaṣṭur virocanāyāṃ virajo virajasya śatajit-pravaraṃ putra-śataṃ kanyā ca viṣūcyāṃ kila jātam
GP10bhp_05u:863: BhP_05.15.015/0 tatrāyaṃ ślokaḥ BhP_05.15.015/1 praiyavrataṃ vaṃśam imaṃ virajaś caramodbhavaḥ BhP_05.15.015/2 akarod aty-alaṃ kīrtyā viṣṇuḥ sura-gaṇaṃ yathā
GP10bhp_05u:865: BhP_05.16.001/1 uktas tvayā bhū-maṇḍalāyāma-viśeṣo yāvad ādityas tapati
GP10bhp_05u:866: yatra cāsau jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaiś candramā vā saha dṛśyate BhP_05.16.002/1 tatrāpi priyavrata-ratha-caraṇa-parikhātaiḥ saptabhiḥ sapta sindhava upakḷptā yata etasyāḥ sapta-dvīpa-viśeṣa-vikalpas tvayā bhagavan khalu sūcita etad evākhilam ahaṃ mānato lakṣaṇataś ca sarvaṃ vi-jijñāsāmi
GP10bhp_05u:867: BhP_05.16.003/1 bhagavato guṇamaye sthūla-rūpa āveśitaṃ mano hy aguṇe 'pi
GP10bhp_05u:868: sūkṣmatama ātma-jyotiṣi pare brahmaṇi bhagavati vāsudevākhye kṣamam āveśituṃ tad u haitad guro 'rhasy anuvarṇayitum iti BhP_05.16.004/0 ṛṣir uvāca BhP_05.16.004/1 na vai mahārāja bhagavato māyā-guṇa-vibhūteḥ kāṣṭhāṃ manasā vacasā vādhigantum alaṃ vibudhāyuṣāpi puruṣas tasmāt prādhān-yenaiva bhū-golaka-viśeṣaṃ nāma-rūpa-māna-lakṣaṇato vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:871: BhP_05.16.006/1 yasmin nava varṣāṇi nava-yojana-sahasrāyāmāny aṣṭabhir
GP10bhp_05u:872: maryādā-giribhiḥ suvibhaktāni bhavanti BhP_05.16.007/1 eṣāṃ madhye ilāvṛtaṃ nāmābhyantara-varṣaṃ yasya nābhyām avasthitaḥ sarvataḥ sauvarṇaḥ kula-giri-rājo merur dvīpāyāma-samunnāhaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:874: sahasra-yojana-vitato mūle ṣoḍaśa-sahasraṃ tāvat āntar-bhūmyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:875: BhP_05.16.008/1 uttarottareṇelāvṛtaṃ nīlaḥ śvetaḥ śṛṅgavān iti trayo
GP10bhp_05u:876: ramyaka-hiraṇmaya-kurūṇāṃ varṣāṇāṃ maryādā-girayaḥ prāg-āyatā ubhayataḥ kṣārodāvadhayo dvi-sahasra-pṛthava ekaikaśaḥ pūrvasmāt pūrvasmād uttara uttaro daśāṃśādhikāṃśena dairghya eva hrasanti
GP10bhp_05u:877: BhP_05.16.009/1 evaṃ dakṣiṇenelāvṛtaṃ niṣadho hemakūṭo himālaya iti
GP10bhp_05u:880: BhP_05.16.010/1 tathaivelāvṛtam apareṇa pūrveṇa ca mālyavad-gandhamādanāv
GP10bhp_05u:881: ānīla-niṣadhāyatau dvi-sahasraṃ paprathatuḥ ketumāla-bhadrāśvayoḥ sīmānaṃ vidadhāte BhP_05.16.011/1 mandaro merumandaraḥ supārśvaḥ kumuda ity ayuta-yojana-vistāronnāhā meroś catur-diśam avaṣṭambha-giraya upakḷptāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:888: BhP_05.16.014/1 devodyānāni ca bhavanti catvāri nandanaṃ caitrarathaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:891: upadeva-gaṇair upagīyamāna-mahimānaḥ kila viharanti BhP_05.16.016/1 mandarotsaṅga ekādaśa-śata-yojanottuṅga-devacūta-śiraso
GP10bhp_05u:893: BhP_05.16.017/1 teṣāṃ viśīryamāṇānām ati-madhura-surabhi-sugandhi-bahulāruṇa-rasodenāruṇodā nāma nadī mandara-giri-śikharān nipatantī pūr-veṇelāvṛtam upaplāvayati
GP10bhp_05u:895: avayava-sparśa-sugandha-vāto daśa-yojanaṃ samantād anuvāsayati BhP_05.16.019/1 evaṃ jambū-phalānām
GP10bhp_05u:896: anasthi-prāyāṇām ibha-kāya-nibhānāṃ rasena jambū nāma nadī
GP10bhp_05u:897: meru-mandara-śikharād ayuta-yojanād avani-tale nipatantī dakṣiṇenātmānaṃ yāvad ilāvṛtam
GP10bhp_05u:898: BhP_05.16.020/1 tāvad ubhayor api rodhasor yā mṛttikā
GP10bhp_05u:901: BhP_05.16.021/1 yad u ha vāva vibudhādayaḥ saha yuvatibhir
GP10bhp_05u:902: mukuṭa-kaṭaka-kaṭi-sūtrādy-ābharaṇa-rūpeṇa khalu dhārayanti BhP_05.16.022/1 yas tu mahā-kadambaḥ supārśva-nirūḍho yās tasya koṭarebhyo
GP10bhp_05u:904: patantyo 'pareṇātmānam ilāvṛtam anumodayanti BhP_05.16.023/1 yā hy upayuñjānānāṃ mukha-nirvāsito vāyuḥ samantāc chata-yojanam anuvāsayati
GP10bhp_05u:905: BhP_05.16.024/1 evaṃ kumuda-nirūḍho yaḥ śatavalśo nāma vaṭas tasya skandhebhyo nīcīnāḥ payo-dadhi-madhu-ghṛta-guḍānnādy-ambara-śayyāsanābharaṇādayaḥ sarva eva kāma-dughā nadāḥ kumudāgrāt patantas tam uttareṇelāvṛtam upayojayanti
GP10bhp_05u:906: BhP_05.16.025/1 yān upajuṣāṇānāṃ na kadācid api prajānāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:908: tāpa-viśeṣā bhavanti yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ niratiśayam eva
GP10bhp_05u:910: viṃśati-girayo meroḥ karṇikāyā iva kesara-bhūtā mūla-deśe parita upakḷptāḥ BhP_05.16.027/1 jaṭhara-devakūṭau meruṃ pūrveṇāṣṭādaśa-yojana-sahasram
GP10bhp_05u:911: udagāyatau dvi-sahasraṃ pṛthu-tuṅgau bhavataḥ evam apareṇa
GP10bhp_05u:912: pavana-pāriyātrau dakṣiṇena kailāsa-karavīrau prāg-āyatāv evam uttaratas triśṛṅga-makarāv aṣṭabhir etaiḥ parisṛto 'gnir iva paritaś cakāsti
GP10bhp_05u:914: BhP_05.16.028/1 meror mūrdhani bhagavata ātma-yoner madhyata upakḷptāṃ purīm ayuta-yojana-sāhasrīṃ sama-caturasrāṃ śātakaumbhīṃ vadanti BhP_05.16.029/1 tām anuparito loka-pālānām aṣṭānāṃ yathā-diśaṃ yathā-rūpaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:917: BhP_05.17.001/1 tatra bhagavataḥ sākṣād yajña-liṅgasya viṣṇor vikramato vāma-pādāṅguṣṭha-nakha-nirbhinnordhvāṇḍa-kaṭāha-vivareṇāntaḥ-praviṣṭā
GP10bhp_05u:921: yuga-sahasropalakṣaṇena divo mūrdhany avatatāra yat tad viṣṇu-padam āhuḥ
GP10bhp_05u:922: BhP_05.17.002/1 yatra ha vāva vīra-vrata auttānapādiḥ parama-bhāgavato
GP10bhp_05u:927: BhP_05.17.003/1 tataḥ sapta ṛṣayas tat prabhāvābhijñā yāṃ nanu tapasa ātyantikī siddhir etāvatī bhagavati sarvātmani vāsudeve
GP10bhp_05u:928: 'nuparata-bhakti-yoga-lābhenaivopekṣitānyārthātma-gatayo muktim ivāgatāṃ mumukṣava iva sabahu-mānam adyāpi jaṭā-jūṭair udvahanti
GP10bhp_05u:931: BhP_05.17.005/1 tatra caturdhā bhidyamānā caturbhir nāmabhiś catur-diśam
GP10bhp_05u:932: abhispandantī nada-nadī-patim evābhiniviśati sītālakanandā cakṣur bhadreti
GP10bhp_05u:937: ketumālam abhi cakṣuḥ pratīcyāṃ diśi sarit-patiṃ praviśati
GP10bhp_05u:938: BhP_05.17.008/1 bhadrā cottarato meru-śiraso nipatitā giri-śikharād
GP10bhp_05u:939: giri-śikharam atihāya śṛṅgavataḥ śṛṅgād avasyandamānā uttarāṃs tu kurūn abhita udīcyāṃ diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati
GP10bhp_05u:942: luṭhayantī bhāratam abhivarṣaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati yasyāṃ snānārthaṃ cāgacchataḥ puṃsaḥ pade pade 'śvamedha-rājasūyādīnāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:944: BhP_05.17.010/1 anye ca nadā nadyaś ca varṣe varṣe santi bahuśo
GP10bhp_05u:946: BhP_05.17.011/1 tatrāpi bhāratam eva varṣaṃ karma-kṣetram anyāny aṣṭa varṣāṇi svargiṇāṃ puṇya-śeṣopabhoga-sthānāni bhaumāni svarga-padāni
GP10bhp_05u:951: tatra tu tretā-yuga-samaḥ kālo vartate BhP_05.17.013/1 yatra ha deva-patayaḥ svaiḥ svair
GP10bhp_05u:959: kāma-kalila-vilāsa-hāsa-līlāvalokākṛṣṭa-mano-dṛṣṭayaḥ svairaṃ viharanti BhP_05.17.014/1 navasv api varṣeṣu bhagavān nārāyaṇo mahā-puruṣaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:961: BhP_05.17.015/1 ilāvṛte tu bhagavān bhava eka eva pumān na hy anyas tatrāparo nirviśati bhavānyāḥ śāpa-nimitta-jño yat-pravekṣyataḥ
GP10bhp_05u:963: BhP_05.17.016/1 bhavānīnāthaiḥ strī-gaṇārbuda-sahasrair avarudhyamāno bhagavataś caturmūrter mahā-puruṣasya turīyāṃ tāmasīṃ mūrtiṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-saṃjñām ātma-samādhi-rūpeṇa sannidhāpyaitad abhigṛṇan bhava upadhāvati BhP_05.17.017/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
GP10bhp_05u:965: sarva-guṇa-saṅkhyānāyānantāyāvyaktāya nama iti BhP_05.17.017/1 bhaje bhajanyāraṇa-pāda-paṅkajaṃ bhagasya kṛtsnasya paraṃ
GP10bhp_05u:967: BhP_05.17.017/2 bhakteṣv alaṃ bhāvita-bhūta-bhāvanaṃ bhavāpahaṃ tvā bhava-bhāvam īśvaram
GP10bhp_05u:968: BhP_05.17.018/1 na yasya māyā-guṇa-citta-vṛttibhir nirīkṣato hy aṇv api dṛṣṭir ajyate
GP10bhp_05u:969: BhP_05.17.018/2 īśe yathā no 'jita-manyu-raṃhasāṃ kas taṃ na manyeta jigīṣur ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:970: BhP_05.17.019/1 asad-dṛśo yaḥ pratibhāti māyayā kṣībeva
GP10bhp_05u:972: BhP_05.17.019/2 na nāga-vadhvo 'rhaṇa īśire hriyā yat-pādayoḥ
GP10bhp_05u:974: BhP_05.17.020/1 yam āhur asya sthiti-janma-saṃyamaṃ tribhir vihīnaṃ yam
GP10bhp_05u:975: anantam ṛṣayaḥ BhP_05.17.020/2 na veda siddhārtham iva kvacit sthitaṃ bhū-maṇḍalaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:977: BhP_05.17.021/1 yasyādya āsīd guṇa-vigraho mahān vijñāna-dhiṣṇyo bhagavān ajaḥ kila
GP10bhp_05u:978: BhP_05.17.021/2 yat-sambhavo 'haṃ tri-vṛtā sva-tejasā vaikārikaṃ tāmasam aindriyaṃ sṛje BhP_05.17.022/1 ete vayaṃ yasya vaśe mahātmanaḥ sthitāḥ śakuntā iva sūtra-yantritāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:979: BhP_05.17.022/2 mahān ahaṃ vaikṛta-tāmasendriyāḥ sṛjāma sarve yad-anugrahād idam
GP10bhp_05u:980: BhP_05.17.023/1 yan-nirmitāṃ karhy api karma-parvaṇīṃ māyāṃ jano 'yaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:982: BhP_05.17.023/2 na veda nistāraṇa-yogam añjasā tasmai namas te vilayodayātmane BhP_05.18.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
GP10bhp_05u:983: BhP_05.18.001/1 tathā ca bhadraśravā nāma dharma-sutas tat-kula-patayaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:984: puruṣā bhadrāśva-varṣe sākṣād bhagavato vāsudevasya priyāṃ tanuṃ dharmamayīṃ hayaśīrṣābhidhānāṃ parameṇa samādhinā sannidhāpyedam abhigṛṇanta upadhāvanti BhP_05.18.002/0 bhadraśravasa ūcuḥ BhP_05.18.002/1 oṃ namo bhagavate dharmāyātma-viśodhanāya nama iti BhP_05.18.003/1 aho vicitraṃ bhagavad-viceṣṭitaṃ ghnantaṃ jano 'yaṃ hi miṣan na paśyati
GP10bhp_05u:985: BhP_05.18.003/2 dhyāyann asad yarhi vikarma sevituṃ nirhṛtya putraṃ pitaraṃ jijīviṣati
GP10bhp_05u:986: BhP_05.18.004/1 vadanti viśvaṃ kavayaḥ sma naśvaraṃ paśyanti cādhyātmavido vipaścitaḥ BhP_05.18.004/2 tathāpi muhyanti tavāja māyayā suvismitaṃ kṛtyam ajaṃ nato 'smi tam
GP10bhp_05u:987: BhP_05.18.005/1 viśvodbhava-sthāna-nirodha-karma te hy akartur aṅgīkṛtam apy apāvṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:988: BhP_05.18.005/2 yuktaṃ na citraṃ tvayi kārya-kāraṇe sarvātmani vyatirikte ca vastutaḥ BhP_05.18.006/1 vedān yugānte tamasā tiraskṛtān rasātalād yo
GP10bhp_05u:990: BhP_05.18.006/2 pratyādade vai kavaye 'bhiyācate tasmai namas te
GP10bhp_05u:997: BhP_05.18.008/1 oṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya namas tejas-tejase
GP10bhp_05u:998: āvir-āvirbhava vajra-nakha vajra-daṃṣṭra karmāśayān randhaya randhaya tamo grasa grasa oṃ svāhā abhayam abhayam ātmani bhūyiṣṭhā oṃ kṣraum BhP_05.18.009/1 svasty astu viśvasya khalaḥ prasīdatāṃ dhyāyantu bhūtāni śivaṃ mitho dhiyā
GP10bhp_05u:999: BhP_05.18.009/2 manaś ca bhadraṃ bhajatād adhokṣaje āveśyatāṃ no matir apy
GP10bhp_05u:1003: BhP_05.18.010/2 yaḥ prāṇa-vṛttyā parituṣṭa ātmavān siddhyaty adūrān na tathendriya-priyaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1004: BhP_05.18.011/1 yat-saṅga-labdhaṃ nija-vīrya-vaibhavaṃ tīrthaṃ muhuḥ saṃspṛśatāṃ hi mānasam
GP10bhp_05u:1005: BhP_05.18.011/2 haraty ajo 'ntaḥ śrutibhir gato 'ṅgajaṃ ko vai na seveta
GP10bhp_05u:1007: BhP_05.18.012/1 yasyāsti bhaktir bhagavaty akiñcanā sarvair guṇais tatra samāsate surāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1008: BhP_05.18.012/2 harāv abhaktasya kuto mahad-guṇā manorathenāsati dhāvato bahiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1009: BhP_05.18.013/1 harir hi sākṣād bhagavān śarīriṇām ātmā jhaṣāṇām iva toyam
GP10bhp_05u:1011: BhP_05.18.013/2 hitvā mahāṃs taṃ yadi sajjate gṛhe tadā mahattvaṃ vayasā
GP10bhp_05u:1016: bhajatākutobhayam iti BhP_05.18.015/1 ketumāle 'pi bhagavān kāmadeva-svarūpeṇa lakṣmyāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1018: puruṣāyuṣāho-rātra-parisaṅkhyānānāṃ yāsāṃ garbhā mahā-puruṣa-mahāstra-tejasodvejita-manasāṃ vidhvastā vyasavaḥ saṃvatsarānte vinipatanti BhP_05.18.016/1 atīva
GP10bhp_05u:1021: BhP_05.18.017/1 tad bhagavato māyāmayaṃ rūpaṃ parama-samādhi-yogena ramā devī saṃvatsarasya rātriṣu prajāpater duhitṛbhir upetāhaḥsu ca tad-bhartṛbhir upāste idaṃ codāharati
GP10bhp_05u:1022: BhP_05.18.018/1 oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ oṃ namo bhagavate hṛṣīkeśāya sarva-guṇa-viśeṣair vilakṣitātmane ākūtīnāṃ cittīnāṃ cetasāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ cādhipataye ṣoḍaśa-kalāya cchando-mayāyānna-mayāyāmṛta-mayāya sarva-mayāya
GP10bhp_05u:1023: sahase ojase balāya kāntāya kāmāya namas te ubhayatra bhūyāt
GP10bhp_05u:1024: BhP_05.18.019/1 striyo vratais tvā hṛṣīkeśvaraṃ svato hy ārādhya loke patim āśāsate 'nyam
GP10bhp_05u:1025: BhP_05.18.019/2 tāsāṃ na te vai paripānty apatyaṃ priyaṃ dhanāyūṃṣi yato
GP10bhp_05u:1027: BhP_05.18.020/1 sa vai patiḥ syād akutobhayaḥ svayaṃ samantataḥ pāti bhayāturaṃ janam BhP_05.18.020/2 sa eka evetarathā mitho bhayaṃ naivātmalābhād adhi manyate param
GP10bhp_05u:1028: BhP_05.18.021/1 yā tasya te pāda-saroruhārhaṇaṃ nikāmayet
GP10bhp_05u:1030: BhP_05.18.021/2 tad eva rāsīpsitam īpsito 'rcito yad-bhagna-yācñā bhagavan pratapyate BhP_05.18.022/1 mat-prāptaye 'jeśa-surāsurādayas tapyanta ugraṃ tapa
GP10bhp_05u:1031: aindriye dhiyaḥ BhP_05.18.022/2 ṛte bhavat-pāda-parāyaṇān na māṃ vindanty ahaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1033: BhP_05.18.023/1 sa tvaṃ mamāpy acyuta śīrṣṇi vanditaṃ karāmbujaṃ yat tvad-adhāyi sātvatām
GP10bhp_05u:1034: BhP_05.18.023/2 bibharṣi māṃ lakṣma vareṇya māyayā ka īśvarasyehitam ūhituṃ vibhur iti
GP10bhp_05u:1035: BhP_05.18.024/1 ramyake ca bhagavataḥ priyatamaṃ mātsyam avatāra-rūpaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1036: tad-varṣa-puruṣasya manoḥ prāk-pradarśitaṃ sa idānīm api mahatā
GP10bhp_05u:1038: BhP_05.18.025/1 oṃ namo bhagavate mukhyatamāya namaḥ sattvāya prāṇāyaujase sahase balāya mahā-matsyāya nama iti BhP_05.18.026/1 antar bahiś cākhila-loka-pālakair adṛṣṭa-rūpo vicarasy
GP10bhp_05u:1040: BhP_05.18.026/2 sa īśvaras tvaṃ ya idaṃ vaśe 'nayan nāmnā yathā dārumayīṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1041: naraḥ striyam BhP_05.18.027/1 yaṃ loka-pālāḥ kila matsara-jvarā hitvā yatanto 'pi pṛthak sametya ca
GP10bhp_05u:1042: BhP_05.18.027/2 pātuṃ na śekur dvi-padaś catuṣ-padaḥ sarīsṛpaṃ sthāṇu yad
GP10bhp_05u:1043: atra dṛśyate BhP_05.18.028/1 bhavān yugāntārṇava ūrmi-mālini kṣoṇīm imām oṣadhi-vīrudhāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1044: BhP_05.18.028/2 mayā sahoru kramate 'ja ojasā tasmai jagat-prāṇa-gaṇātmane
GP10bhp_05u:1045: nama iti BhP_05.18.029/1 hiraṇmaye 'pi bhagavān nivasati kūrma-tanuṃ bibhrāṇas tasya tat priyatamāṃ tanum aryamā saha varṣa-puruṣaiḥ pitṛ-gaṇādhipatir
GP10bhp_05u:1049: bhūmne namo namo 'vasthānāya namas te BhP_05.18.031/1 yad-rūpam etan nija-māyayārpitam
GP10bhp_05u:1051: BhP_05.18.031/2 saṅkhyā na yasyāsty ayathopalambhanāt tasmai namas te
GP10bhp_05u:1055: BhP_05.18.032/2 dyauḥ khaṃ kṣitiḥ śaila-sarit-samudra- dvīpa-graharkṣety
GP10bhp_05u:1056: abhidheya ekaḥ BhP_05.18.033/1 yasminn asaṅkhyeya-viśeṣa-nāma- rūpākṛtau kavibhiḥ kalpiteyam
GP10bhp_05u:1057: BhP_05.18.033/2 saṅkhyā yayā tattva-dṛśāpanīyate tasmai namaḥ sāṅkhya-nidarśanāya te iti BhP_05.18.034/1 uttareṣu ca kuruṣu bhagavān yajña-puruṣaḥ kṛta-varāha-rūpa
GP10bhp_05u:1058: āste taṃ tu devī haiṣā bhūḥ saha kurubhir askhalita-bhakti-yogenopadhāvati
GP10bhp_05u:1059: imāṃ ca paramām upaniṣadam āvartayati BhP_05.18.035/1 oṃ namo bhagavate mantra-tattva-liṅgāya
GP10bhp_05u:1060: mahā-dhvarāvayavāya mahā-puruṣāya namaḥ karma-śuklāya tri-yugāya namas te BhP_05.18.036/1 yasya svarūpaṃ kavayo vipaścito guṇeṣu dāruṣv iva
GP10bhp_05u:1062: BhP_05.18.036/2 mathnanti mathnā manasā didṛkṣavo gūḍhaṃ kriyārthair nama īritātmane BhP_05.18.037/1 dravya-kriyā-hetv-ayaneśa-kartṛbhir māyā-guṇair
GP10bhp_05u:1064: BhP_05.18.037/2 anvīkṣayāṅgātiśayātma-buddhibhir nirasta-māyākṛtaye namo namaḥ BhP_05.18.038/1 karoti viśva-sthiti-saṃyamodayaṃ yasyepsitaṃ nepsitam īkṣitur guṇaiḥ BhP_05.18.038/2 māyā yathāyo bhramate tad-āśrayaṃ grāvṇo namas te
GP10bhp_05u:1066: BhP_05.18.039/1 pramathya daityaṃ prativāraṇaṃ mṛdhe yo māṃ rasāyā
GP10bhp_05u:1068: BhP_05.18.039/2 kṛtvāgra-daṃṣṭre niragād udanvataḥ krīḍann ivebhaḥ praṇatāsmi taṃ vibhum iti BhP_05.19.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
GP10bhp_05u:1069: BhP_05.19.001/1 kimpuruṣe varṣe bhagavantam ādi-puruṣaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaṃ sītābhirāmaṃ rāmaṃ tac-caraṇa-sannikarṣābhirataḥ parama-bhāgavato hanumān saha kimpuruṣair avirata-bhaktir upāste
GP10bhp_05u:1070: BhP_05.19.002/1 ārṣṭiṣeṇena saha gandharvair anugīyamānāṃ parama-kalyāṇīṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1072: BhP_05.19.003/1 oṃ namo bhagavate uttamaślokāya nama ārya-lakṣaṇa-śīla-vratāya nama upaśikṣitātmana upāsita-lokāya namaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1073: sādhu-vāda-nikaṣaṇāya namo brahmaṇya-devāya mahā-puruṣāya mahā-rājāya nama iti BhP_05.19.004/1 yat tad viśuddhānubhava-mātram ekaṃ sva-tejasā
GP10bhp_05u:1075: BhP_05.19.004/2 pratyak praśāntaṃ sudhiyopalambhanaṃ hy anāma-rūpaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1076: nirahaṃ prapadye BhP_05.19.005/1 martyāvatāras tv iha martya-śikṣaṇaṃ rakṣo-vadhāyaiva na kevalaṃ vibhoḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1077: BhP_05.19.005/2 kuto 'nyathā syād ramataḥ sva ātmanaḥ sītā-kṛtāni
GP10bhp_05u:1079: BhP_05.19.006/1 na vai sa ātmātmavatāṃ suhṛttamaḥ saktas tri-lokyāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1080: bhagavān vāsudevaḥ BhP_05.19.006/2 na strī-kṛtaṃ kaśmalam aśnuvīta na lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi vihātum
GP10bhp_05u:1082: BhP_05.19.007/1 na janma nūnaṃ mahato na saubhagaṃ na vāṅ na buddhir nākṛtis toṣa-hetuḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1083: BhP_05.19.007/2 tair yad visṛṣṭān api no vanaukasaś cakāra sakhye bata
GP10bhp_05u:1085: BhP_05.19.008/1 suro 'suro vāpy atha vānaro naraḥ sarvātmanā yaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1086: sukṛtajñam uttamam BhP_05.19.008/2 bhajeta rāmaṃ manujākṛtiṃ hariṃ ya uttarān anayat kosalān divam iti BhP_05.19.009/1 bhārate 'pi varṣe bhagavān nara-nārāyaṇākhya ākalpāntam
GP10bhp_05u:1089: BhP_05.19.010/1 taṃ bhagavān nārado varṇāśramavatībhir bhāratībhiḥ prajābhir bhagavat-proktābhyāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1090: bhagavad-anubhāvopavarṇanaṃ sāvarṇer upadekṣyamāṇaḥ parama-bhakti-bhāvenopasarati idaṃ cābhigṛṇāti BhP_05.19.011/1 oṃ namo bhagavate upaśama-śīlāyoparatānātmyāya namo
GP10bhp_05u:1093: BhP_05.19.012/0 gāyati cedam BhP_05.19.012/1 kartāsya sargādiṣu yo na badhyate na hanyate deha-gato 'pi
GP10bhp_05u:1095: BhP_05.19.012/2 draṣṭur na dṛg yasya guṇair vidūṣyate tasmai namo 'sakta-vivikta-sākṣiṇe
GP10bhp_05u:1096: BhP_05.19.013/1 idaṃ hi yogeśvara yoga-naipuṇaṃ hiraṇyagarbho bhagavāñ jagāda yat BhP_05.19.013/2 yad anta-kāle tvayi nirguṇe mano bhaktyā
GP10bhp_05u:1100: BhP_05.19.014/2 śaṅketa vidvān kukalevarātyayād yas tasya yatnaḥ śrama eva kevalam
GP10bhp_05u:1101: BhP_05.19.015/1 tan naḥ prabho tvaṃ kukalevarārpitāṃ tvan-māyayāhaṃ-mamatām adhokṣaja
GP10bhp_05u:1102: BhP_05.19.015/2 bhindyāma yenāśu vayaṃ sudurbhidāṃ vidhehi yogaṃ tvayi naḥ svabhāvam iti BhP_05.19.016/1 bhārate 'py asmin varṣe saric-chailāḥ santi bahavo malayo
GP10bhp_05u:1103: maṅgala-prastho mainākas trikūṭa ṛṣabhaḥ kūṭakaḥ kollakaḥ sahyo devagirir ṛṣyamūkaḥ śrī-śailo veṅkaṭo mahendro vāridhāro vindhyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣagiriḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1104: pāriyātro droṇaś citrakūṭo govardhano raivatakaḥ kakubho nīlo gokāmukha indrakīlaḥ kāmagirir iti cānye ca śata-sahasraśaḥ śailās teṣāṃ nitamba-prabhavā nadā nadyaś ca santy asaṅkhyātāḥ BhP_05.19.017/1 etāsām apo bhāratyaḥ prajā nāmabhir eva punantīnām ātmanā copaspṛśanti
GP10bhp_05u:1105: BhP_05.19.018/1 candravasā tāmraparṇī avaṭodā kṛtamālā vaihāyasī kāverī
GP10bhp_05u:1106: veṇī payasvinī śarkarāvartā tuṅgabhadrā kṛṣṇāveṇyā bhīmarathī godāvarī nirvindhyā payoṣṇī tāpī revā surasā narmadā carmaṇvatī sindhur andhaḥ śoṇaś ca nadau mahānadī vedasmṛtir ṛṣikulyā trisāmā kauśikī mandākinī yamunā sarasvatī dṛṣadvatī gomatī sarayū rodhasvatī saptavatī suṣomā śatadrūś candrabhāgā marudvṛdhā vitastā asiknī viśveti mahā-nadyaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1107: BhP_05.19.019/1 asminn eva varṣe puruṣair labdha-janmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1109: bahvya ātmana ānupūrvyeṇa sarvā hy eva sarveṣāṃ vidhīyante yathā-varṇa-vidhānam apavargaś cāpi bhavati
GP10bhp_05u:1113: BhP_05.19.021/0 etad eva hi devā gāyanti BhP_05.19.021/1 aho amīṣāṃ kim akāri śobhanaṃ prasanna eṣāṃ svid uta
GP10bhp_05u:1114: svayaṃ hariḥ BhP_05.19.021/2 yair janma labdhaṃ nṛṣu bhāratājire mukunda-sevaupayikaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1116: BhP_05.19.022/1 kiṃ duṣkarair naḥ kratubhis tapo-vratair dānādibhir vā dyujayena phalgunā BhP_05.19.022/2 na yatra nārāyaṇa-pāda-paṅkaja- smṛtiḥ pramuṣṭātiśayendriyotsavāt BhP_05.19.023/1 kalpāyuṣāṃ sthānajayāt punar-bhavāt kṣaṇāyuṣāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1118: BhP_05.19.023/2 kṣaṇena martyena kṛtaṃ manasvinaḥ sannyasya saṃyānty
GP10bhp_05u:1120: BhP_05.19.024/1 na yatra vaikuṇṭha-kathā-sudhāpagā na sādhavo bhāgavatās
GP10bhp_05u:1122: BhP_05.19.024/2 na yatra yajñeśa-makhā mahotsavāḥ sureśa-loko 'pi na vai sa sevyatām BhP_05.19.025/1 prāptā nṛ-jātiṃ tv iha ye ca jantavo jñāna-kriyā-dravya-kalāpa-sambhṛtām
GP10bhp_05u:1123: BhP_05.19.025/2 na vai yaterann apunar-bhavāya te bhūyo vanaukā iva yānti bandhanam
GP10bhp_05u:1124: BhP_05.19.026/1 yaiḥ śraddhayā barhiṣi bhāgaśo havir niruptam iṣṭaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1126: BhP_05.19.026/2 ekaḥ pṛthaṅ-nāmabhir āhuto mudā gṛhṇāti pūrṇaḥ svayam āśiṣāṃ prabhuḥ BhP_05.19.027/1 satyaṃ diśaty arthitam arthito nṛṇāṃ naivārthado yat punar arthitā yataḥ BhP_05.19.027/2 svayaṃ vidhatte bhajatām anicchatām icchāpidhānaṃ nija-pāda-pallavam
GP10bhp_05u:1127: BhP_05.19.028/1 yady atra naḥ svarga-sukhāvaśeṣitaṃ sviṣṭasya sūktasya kṛtasya śobhanam BhP_05.19.028/2 tenājanābhe smṛtimaj janma naḥ syād varṣe harir
GP10bhp_05u:1128: yad-bhajatāṃ śaṃ tanoti BhP_05.19.029/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
GP10bhp_05u:1129: BhP_05.19.029/1 jambūdvīpasya ca rājann upadvīpān aṣṭau haika upadiśanti sagarātmajair aśvānveṣaṇa imāṃ mahīṃ parito nikhanadbhir upakalpitān BhP_05.19.030/1 tad yathā svarṇaprasthaś candraśukla āvartano ramaṇako
GP10bhp_05u:1136: BhP_05.20.002/1 jambūdvīpo 'yaṃ yāvat-pramāṇa-vistāras tāvatā kṣārodadhinā pariveṣṭito yathā merur jambv-ākhyena lavaṇodadhir api tato
GP10bhp_05u:1137: dvi-guṇa-viśālena plakṣākhyena parikṣipto yathā parikhā bāhyopavanena plakṣo jambū-pramāṇo dvīpākhyākaro hiraṇmaya utthito yatrāgnir upāste sapta-jihvas tasyādhipatiḥ priyavratātmaja idhmajihvaḥ svaṃ dvīpaṃ sapta-varṣāṇi vibhajya sapta-varṣa-nāmabhya ātmajebhya ākalayya svayam
GP10bhp_05u:1139: BhP_05.20.003/1 śivaṃ yavasaṃ subhadraṃ śāntaṃ kṣemam amṛtam abhayam iti varṣāṇi teṣu girayo nadyaś ca saptaivābhijñātāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1140: BhP_05.20.004/1 maṇikūṭo vajrakūṭa indraseno jyotiṣmān suparṇo hiraṇyaṣṭhīvo meghamāla iti setu-śailāḥ aruṇā nṛmṇāṅgirasī sāvitrī
GP10bhp_05u:1141: suptabhātā ṛtambharā satyambharā iti mahā-nadyaḥ yāsāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1146: BhP_05.20.005/1 pratnasya viṣṇo rūpaṃ yat satyasyartasya brahmaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1147: BhP_05.20.005/2 amṛtasya ca mṛtyoś ca sūryam ātmānam īmahīti
GP10bhp_05u:1148: BhP_05.20.006/1 plakṣādiṣu pañcasu puruṣāṇām āyur indriyam ojaḥ saho balaṃ buddhir vikrama iti ca sarveṣām autpattikī siddhir aviśeṣeṇa vartate
GP10bhp_05u:1149: BhP_05.20.007/1 plakṣaḥ sva-samānenekṣu-rasodenāvṛto yathā tathā dvīpo 'pi
GP10bhp_05u:1151: BhP_05.20.008/1 yatra ha vai śālmalī plakṣāyāmā yasyāṃ vāva kila nilayam
GP10bhp_05u:1152: āhur bhagavataś chandaḥ-stutaḥ patattri-rājasya sā dvīpa-hūtaye
GP10bhp_05u:1155: saptabhyas tan-nāmāni sapta-varṣāṇi vyabhajat surocanaṃ saumanasyaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1156: ramaṇakaṃ deva-varṣaṃ pāribhadram āpyāyanam avijñātam iti
GP10bhp_05u:1157: BhP_05.20.010/1 teṣu varṣādrayo nadyaś ca saptaivābhijñātāḥ svarasaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1158: śataśṛṅgo vāmadevaḥ kundo mukundaḥ puṣpa-varṣaḥ sahasra-śrutir iti anumatiḥ sinīvālī sarasvatī kuhū rajanī nandā rāketi BhP_05.20.011/1 tad-varṣa-puruṣāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1161: BhP_05.20.012/2 prajānāṃ sarvāsāṃ rājā- ndhaḥ somo na āstv iti BhP_05.20.013/1 evaṃ surodād bahis tad-dvi-guṇaḥ samānenāvṛto ghṛtodena yathā-pūrvaḥ kuśa-dvīpo yasmin kuśa-stambo deva-kṛtas tad-dvīpākhyākaro
GP10bhp_05u:1162: jvalana ivāparaḥ sva-śaṣpa-rociṣā diśo virājayati BhP_05.20.014/1 tad-dvīpa-patiḥ praiyavrato rājan hiraṇyaretā nāma svaṃ dvīpaṃ saptabhyaḥ sva-putrebhyo yathā-bhāgaṃ vibhajya svayaṃ tapa
GP10bhp_05u:1165: BhP_05.20.015/1 teṣāṃ varṣeṣu sīmā-girayo nadyaś cābhijñātāḥ sapta
GP10bhp_05u:1166: saptaiva cakraś catuḥśṛṅgaḥ kapilaś citrakūṭo devānīka ūrdhvaromā draviṇa iti rasakulyā madhukulyā mitravindā śrutavindā devagarbhā ghṛtacyutā mantramāleti BhP_05.20.016/1 yāsāṃ payobhiḥ kuśadvīpaukasaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1169: BhP_05.20.017/1 parasya brahmaṇaḥ sākṣāj jāta-vedo 'si havyavāṭ
GP10bhp_05u:1170: BhP_05.20.017/2 devānāṃ puruṣāṅgānāṃ yajñena puruṣaṃ yajeti BhP_05.20.018/1 tathā ghṛtodād bahiḥ krauñcadvīpo dvi-guṇaḥ sva-mānena
GP10bhp_05u:1171: kṣīrodena parita upakḷpto vṛto yathā kuśadvīpo ghṛtodena yasmin krauñco nāma parvata-rājo dvīpa-nāma-nirvartaka āste
GP10bhp_05u:1174: BhP_05.20.020/1 tasminn api praiyavrato ghṛtapṛṣṭho nāmādhipatiḥ sve dvīpe varṣāṇi sapta vibhajya teṣu putra-nāmasu sapta rikthādān varṣapān niveśya svayaṃ bhagavān bhagavataḥ parama-kalyāṇa-yaśasa ātma-bhūtasya hareś caraṇāravindam upajagāma
GP10bhp_05u:1175: BhP_05.20.021/1 āmo madhuruho meghapṛṣṭhaḥ sudhāmā bhrājiṣṭho lohitārṇo
GP10bhp_05u:1176: vanaspatir iti ghṛtapṛṣṭha-sutās teṣāṃ varṣa-girayaḥ sapta saptaiva nadyaś
GP10bhp_05u:1177: cābhikhyātāḥ śuklo vardhamāno bhojana upabarhiṇo nando nandanaḥ sarvatobhadra iti abhayā amṛtaughā āryakā tīrthavatī rūpavatī pavitravatī
GP10bhp_05u:1179: BhP_05.20.022/1 yāsām ambhaḥ pavitram amalam upayuñjānāḥ puruṣa-ṛṣabha-draviṇa-devaka-saṃjñā varṣa-puruṣā āpomayaṃ devam apāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1180: pūrṇenāñjalinā yajante BhP_05.20.023/1 āpaḥ puruṣa-vīryāḥ stha punantīr bhūr-bhuvaḥ-suvaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1181: BhP_05.20.023/2 tā naḥ punītāmīva-ghnīḥ spṛśatām ātmanā bhuva iti
GP10bhp_05u:1182: BhP_05.20.024/1 evaṃ purastāt kṣīrodāt parita upaveśitaḥ śākadvīpo
GP10bhp_05u:1183: dvātriṃśal-lakṣa-yojanāyāmaḥ samānena ca dadhi-maṇḍodena parīto yasmin śāko nāma mahīruhaḥ sva-kṣetra-vyapadeśako yasya ha mahā-surabhi-gandhas
GP10bhp_05u:1185: BhP_05.20.025/1 tasyāpi praiyavrata evādhipatir nāmnā medhātithiḥ so 'pi
GP10bhp_05u:1186: vibhajya sapta varṣāṇi putra-nāmāni teṣu svātmajān purojava-manojava-pavamāna-dhūmrānīka-citrarepha-bahurūpa-viśvadhāra-saṃjñān
GP10bhp_05u:1187: nidhāpyādhipatīn svayaṃ bhagavaty ananta ā-veśita-matis tapovanaṃ praviveśa BhP_05.20.026/1 eteṣāṃ varṣa-maryādā-girayo nadyaś ca sapta saptaiva īśāna uruśṛṅgo balabhadraḥ śatakesaraḥ sahasrasroto devapālo mahānasa iti anaghāyurdā ubhayaspṛṣṭir aparājitā pañcapadī sahasrasrutir nijadhṛtir iti BhP_05.20.027/1 tad-varṣa-puruṣā
GP10bhp_05u:1190: BhP_05.20.028/1 antaḥ-praviśya bhūtāni yo bibharty ātma-ketubhiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1191: BhP_05.20.028/2 antaryāmīśvaraḥ sākṣāt pātu no yad-vaśe sphuṭam
GP10bhp_05u:1192: BhP_05.20.029/1 evam eva dadhi-maṇḍodāt parataḥ puṣkaradvīpas tato
GP10bhp_05u:1193: dvi-guṇāyāmaḥ samantata upakalpitaḥ samānena svādūdakena samudreṇa bahir
GP10bhp_05u:1197: evārvācīna-parācīna-varṣayor maryādācalo 'yuta-yojanocchrāyāyāmo yatra tu catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāri purāṇi loka-pālānām indrādīnāṃ yad-upariṣṭāt
GP10bhp_05u:1198: sūrya-rathasya meruṃ paribhramataḥ saṃvatsarātmakaṃ cakraṃ devānām aho-rātrābhyāṃ paribhramati
GP10bhp_05u:1200: nāmaitasyātmajau ramaṇaka-dhātaki-nāmānau varṣa-patī niyujya sa svayaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1202: BhP_05.20.032/1 tad-varṣa-puruṣā bhagavantaṃ brahma-rūpiṇaṃ sakarmakeṇa karmaṇārādhayantīdaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1203: BhP_05.20.033/1 yat tat karmamayaṃ liṅgaṃ brahma-liṅgaṃ jano 'rcayet
GP10bhp_05u:1204: BhP_05.20.033/2 ekāntam advayaṃ śāntaṃ tasmai bhagavate nama iti
GP10bhp_05u:1205: BhP_05.20.034/1 tataḥ parastāl lokāloka-nāmācalo lokālokayor antarāle parita upakṣiptaḥ BhP_05.20.035/1 yāvan mānasottara-mervor antaraṃ tāvatī bhūmiḥ kāñcany
GP10bhp_05u:1206: anyādarśa-talopamā yasyāṃ prahitaḥ padārtho na kathañcit punaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1208: BhP_05.20.036/1 lokāloka iti samākhyā yad anenācalena lokālokasyāntarvar-tināvasthāpyate
GP10bhp_05u:1209: BhP_05.20.037/1 sa loka-trayānte parita īśvareṇa vihito yasmāt sūryādīnāṃ dhruvāpavargāṇāṃ jyotir-gaṇānāṃ gabhastayo 'rvācīnāṃs trīn lokān āvitanvānā na kadācit parācīnā bhavitum utsahante tāvad un-nahanāyāmaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1210: BhP_05.20.038/1 etāvān loka-vinyāso māna-lakṣaṇa-saṃsthābhir vicintitaḥ kavibhiḥ sa tu pañcāśat-koṭi-gaṇitasya bhū-golasya turīya-bhāgo 'yaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1213: āśāsvātma-yoninākhila-jagad-guruṇādhiniveśitā ye dvirada-pataya ṛṣabhaḥ puṣkaracūḍo vāmano 'parājita iti sakala-loka-sthiti-hetavaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1219: nija-varāyudhopaśobhitair nija-bhuja-daṇḍaiḥ sandhārayamāṇas tasmin giri-vare samantāt sakala-loka-svastaya āste
GP10bhp_05u:1220: BhP_05.20.041/1 ākalpam evaṃ veṣaṃ gata eṣa bhagavān ātma-yogamāyayā
GP10bhp_05u:1222: BhP_05.20.042/1 yo 'ntar-vistāra etena hy aloka-parimāṇaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ yad bahir lokālokācalāt tataḥ parastād yogeśvara-gatiṃ viśuddhām udāharanti BhP_05.20.043/1 aṇḍa-madhya-gataḥ sūryo dyāv-ābhūmyor yad antaram BhP_05.20.043/2 sūryāṇḍa-golayor madhye koṭyaḥ syuḥ pañca-viṃśatiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1223: BhP_05.20.044/1 mṛte 'ṇḍa eṣa etasmin yad abhūt tato mārtaṇḍa iti vyapadeśaḥ hiraṇyagarbha iti yad dhiraṇyāṇḍa-samudbhavaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1224: BhP_05.20.045/1 sūryeṇa hi vibhajyante diśaḥ khaṃ dyaur mahī bhidā BhP_05.20.045/2 svargāpavargau narakā rasaukāṃsi ca sarvaśaḥ BhP_05.20.046/1 deva-tiryaṅ-manuṣyāṇāṃ sarīsṛpa-savīrudhām
GP10bhp_05u:1227: BhP_05.21.001/1 etāvān eva bhū-valayasya sanniveśaḥ pramāṇa-lakṣaṇato
GP10bhp_05u:1229: BhP_05.21.002/1 etena hi divo maṇḍala-mānaṃ tad-vida upadiśanti yathā dvi-dalayor niṣpāvādīnāṃ te antareṇāntarikṣaṃ tad-ubhaya-sandhitam
GP10bhp_05u:1230: BhP_05.21.003/1 yan-madhya-gato bhagavāṃs tapatāṃ patis tapana ātapena tri-lokīṃ pratapaty avabhāsayaty ātma-bhāsā sa eṣa udagayana-dakṣiṇāyana-vaiṣuvata-saṃjñābhir māndya-śaighrya-samānābhir
GP10bhp_05u:1231: gatibhir ārohaṇāvarohaṇa-samāna-sthāneṣu yathā-savanam abhipadyamāno makarādiṣu rāśiṣv aho-rātrāṇi dīrgha-hrasva-samānāni vidhatte
GP10bhp_05u:1232: BhP_05.21.004/1 yadā meṣa-tulayor vartate tadāho-rātrāṇi samānāni bhavanti yadā vṛṣabhādiṣu pañcasu ca rāśiṣu carati tadāhāny eva vardhante hrasati ca māsi māsy ekaikā ghaṭikā rātriṣu
GP10bhp_05u:1233: BhP_05.21.005/1 yadā vṛścikādiṣu pañcasu vartate tadāho-rātrāṇi
GP10bhp_05u:1234: viparyayāṇi bhavanti BhP_05.21.006/1 yāvad dakṣiṇāyanam ahāni vardhante yāvad udagayanaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1236: BhP_05.21.007/1 evaṃ nava koṭaya eka-pañcāśal-lakṣāṇi yojanānāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1237: mānasottara-giri-parivartanasyopadiśanti tasminn aindrīṃ purīṃ pūrvasmān meror devadhānīṃ nāma dakṣiṇato yāmyāṃ saṃyamanīṃ nāma paścād vāruṇīṃ nimlocanīṃ nāma uttarataḥ saumyāṃ vibhāvarīṃ nāma
GP10bhp_05u:1240: BhP_05.21.008/1 tatratyānāṃ divasa-madhyaṅgata eva sadādityas tapati
GP10bhp_05u:1242: BhP_05.21.009/1 yatrodeti tasya ha samāna-sūtra-nipāte nimlocati yatra kvacana syandenābhitapati tasya haiṣa samāna-sūtra-nipāte prasvāpayati tatra gataṃ na paśyanti ye taṃ samanupaśyeran BhP_05.21.010/1 yadā caindryāḥ puryāḥ pracalate pañcadaśa-ghaṭikābhir
GP10bhp_05u:1243: yāmyāṃ sapāda-koṭi-dvayaṃ yojanānāṃ sārdha-dvādaśa-lakṣāṇi sādhikāni copayāti BhP_05.21.011/1 evaṃ tato vāruṇīṃ saumyām aindrīṃ ca punas tathānye ca
GP10bhp_05u:1244: grahāḥ somādayo nakṣatraiḥ saha jyotiś-cakre samabhyudyanti saha vā
GP10bhp_05u:1247: aṣṭa-śatādhikāni sauro rathas trayīmayo 'sau catasṛṣu parivartate purīṣu
GP10bhp_05u:1248: BhP_05.21.013/1 yasyaikaṃ cakraṃ dvādaśāraṃ ṣaṇ-nemi tri-ṇābhi
GP10bhp_05u:1249: saṃvatsarātmakaṃ samāmananti tasyākṣo meror mūrdhani kṛto mānasottare
GP10bhp_05u:1252: BhP_05.21.014/1 tasminn akṣe kṛtamūlo dvitīyo 'kṣas turyamānena sammitas taila-yantrākṣavad dhruve kṛtopari-bhāgaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1254: tat-turīya-bhāga-viśālas tāvān ravi-ratha-yugo yatra hayāś chando-nāmānaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1256: BhP_05.21.016/1 purastāt savitur aruṇaḥ paścāc ca niyuktaḥ sautye karmaṇi kilāste
GP10bhp_05u:1258: ṣaṣṭi-sahasrāṇi purataḥ sūryaṃ sūkta-vākāya niyuktāḥ saṃstuvanti BhP_05.21.018/1 tathānye ca ṛṣayo gandharvāpsaraso nāgā grāmaṇyo yātudhānā devā ity ekaikaśo gaṇāḥ sapta caturdaśa māsi māsi bhagavantaṃ sūryam ātmānaṃ nānā-nāmānaṃ pṛthaṅ-nānā-nāmānaḥ pṛthak-karmabhir dvandvaśa upāsate BhP_05.22.001/0 rājovāca
GP10bhp_05u:1259: BhP_05.22.001/1 yad etad bhagavata ādityasya meruṃ dhruvaṃ ca pradakṣiṇena parikrāmato rāśīnām abhimukhaṃ pracalitaṃ cāpradakṣiṇaṃ bhagavatopavarṇitam amuṣya vayaṃ katham anumimīmahīti BhP_05.22.002/0 sa hovāca BhP_05.22.002/1 yathā kulāla-cakreṇa bhramatā saha bhramatāṃ tad-āśrayāṇāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1260: pipīlikādīnāṃ gatir anyaiva pradeśāntareṣv apy upalabhyamānatvād evaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1261: nakṣatra-rāśibhir upalakṣitena kāla-cakreṇa dhruvaṃ meruṃ ca pradakṣiṇena paridhāvatā saha paridhāvamānānāṃ tad-āśrayāṇāṃ sūryādīnāṃ grahāṇāṃ gatir
GP10bhp_05u:1263: BhP_05.22.003/1 sa eṣa bhagavān ādi-puruṣa eva sākṣān nārāyaṇo lokānāṃ svastaya ātmānaṃ trayīmayaṃ karma-viśuddhi-nimittaṃ kavibhir api ca vedena vijijñāsyamāno dvādaśadhā vibhajya ṣaṭsu vasantādiṣv ṛtuṣu yathopa-joṣam
GP10bhp_05u:1265: BhP_05.22.004/1 tam etam iha puruṣās trayyā vidyayā varṇāśramācārānupathā uccāvacaiḥ karmabhir āmnātair yoga-vitānaiś ca śraddhayā yajanto 'ñjasā
GP10bhp_05u:1266: śreyaḥ samadhigacchanti BhP_05.22.005/1 atha sa eṣa ātmā lokānāṃ dyāv-āpṛthivyor antareṇa
GP10bhp_05u:1267: nabho-valayasya kālacakra-gato dvādaśa māsān bhuṅkte rāśi-saṃjñān
GP10bhp_05u:1268: saṃvatsarāvayavān māsaḥ pakṣa-dvayaṃ divā naktaṃ ceti sapādarkṣa-dvayam
GP10bhp_05u:1269: upadiśanti yāvatā ṣaṣṭham aṃśaṃ bhuñjīta sa vai ṛtur ity upadiśyate saṃvatsarāvayavaḥ BhP_05.22.006/1 atha ca yāvatārdhena nabho-vīthyāṃ pracarati taṃ kālam
GP10bhp_05u:1270: ayanam ācakṣate BhP_05.22.007/1 atha ca yāvan nabho-maṇḍalaṃ saha dyāv-āpṛthivyor
GP10bhp_05u:1271: maṇḍalābhyāṃ kārtsnyena sa ha bhuñjīta taṃ kālaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ parivatsaram iḍāvatsaram anuvatsaraṃ vatsaram iti bhānor māndya-śaighrya-sama-gatibhiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1273: BhP_05.22.008/1 evaṃ candramā arka-gabhastibhya upariṣṭāl lakṣa-yojanata
GP10bhp_05u:1275: sapādarkṣābhyāṃ dinenaiva pakṣa-bhuktim agracārī drutatara-gamano bhuṅkte
GP10bhp_05u:1276: BhP_05.22.009/1 atha cāpūryamāṇābhiś ca kalābhir amarāṇāṃ kṣīyamāṇābhiś ca kalābhiḥ pit-ṇām aho-rātrāṇi pūrva-pakṣāpara-pakṣābhyāṃ vitanvānaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1277: sarva-jīva-nivaha-prāṇo jīvaś caikam ekaṃ nakṣatraṃ triṃśatā muhūrtair
GP10bhp_05u:1279: BhP_05.22.010/1 ya eṣa ṣoḍaśa-kalaḥ puruṣo bhagavān manomayo 'nnamayo
GP10bhp_05u:1282: BhP_05.22.011/1 tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanato nakṣatrāṇi meruṃ dakṣiṇenaiva kālāyana īśvara-yojitāni sahābhijitāṣṭā-viṃśatiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1283: BhP_05.22.012/1 tata upariṣṭād uśanā dvi-lakṣa-yojanata upalabhyate purataḥ paścāt sahaiva vārkasya śaighrya-māndya-sāmyābhir gatibhir arkavac carati lokānāṃ nityadānukūla eva prāyeṇa varṣayaṃś cāreṇānumīyate sa vṛṣṭi-viṣṭambha-grahopaśamanaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1284: BhP_05.22.013/1 uśanasā budho vyākhyātas tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanato
GP10bhp_05u:1285: budhaḥ soma-suta upalabhyamānaḥ prāyeṇa śubha-kṛd yadārkād vyatiricyeta tadātivātābhra-prāyānāvṛṣṭy-ādi-bhayam
GP10bhp_05u:1287: upalabhyamānas tribhis tribhiḥ pakṣair ekaikaśo rāśīn dvādaśānubhuṅkte yadi na vakreṇābhivartate prāyeṇāśubha-graho 'gha-śaṃsaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1288: BhP_05.22.015/1 tata upariṣṭād dvi-lakṣa-yojanāntara-gatā bhagavān bṛhaspatir ekaikasmin rāśau parivatsaraṃ parivatsaraṃ carati yadi na
GP10bhp_05u:1290: BhP_05.22.016/1 tata upariṣṭād yojana-lakṣa-dvayāt pratīyamānaḥ śanaiścara ekaikasmin rāśau triṃśan māsān vilambamānaḥ sarvān evānuparyeti tāvadbhir anuvatsaraiḥ prāyeṇa hi sarveṣām aśāntikaraḥ BhP_05.22.017/1 tata uttarasmād ṛṣaya ekādaśa-lakṣa-yojanāntara
GP10bhp_05u:1291: upalabhyante ya eva lokānāṃ śam anubhāvayanto bhagavato viṣṇor yat paramaṃ padaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1293: BhP_05.23.001/1 atha tasmāt paratas trayodaśa-lakṣa-yojanāntarato yat tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam abhivadanti yatra ha mahā-bhāgavato dhruva auttānapādir agninendreṇa prajāpatinā kaśyapena dharmeṇa ca
GP10bhp_05u:1294: samakāla-yugbhiḥ sabahu-mānaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ kriyamāṇa idānīm api
GP10bhp_05u:1296: BhP_05.23.002/1 sa hi sarveṣāṃ jyotir-gaṇānāṃ graha-nakṣatrādīnām
GP10bhp_05u:1297: animiṣeṇāvyakta-raṃhasā bhagavatā kālena bhrāmyamāṇānāṃ sthāṇur ivāvaṣṭambha īśvareṇa vihitaḥ śaśvad avabhāsate
GP10bhp_05u:1298: BhP_05.23.003/1 yathā meḍhīstambha ākramaṇa-paśavaḥ saṃyojitās tribhis tribhiḥ savanair yathā-sthānaṃ maṇḍalāni caranty evaṃ bhagaṇā grahādaya etasminn antar-bahir-yogena kāla-cakra āyojitā dhruvam evāvalambya
GP10bhp_05u:1299: vāyunodīryamāṇā ākalpāntaṃ paricaṅ kramanti nabhasi yathā meghāḥ śyenādayo vāyu-vaśāḥ karma-sārathayaḥ parivartante evaṃ jyotirgaṇāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1301: BhP_05.23.004/1 kecanaitaj jyotir-anīkaṃ śiśumāra-saṃsthānena bhagavato vāsudevasya yoga-dhāraṇāyām
GP10bhp_05u:1302: BhP_05.23.005/1 yasya pucchāgre 'vākśirasaḥ kuṇḍalī-bhūta-dehasya dhruva upakalpitas tasya lāṅgūle prajāpatir agnir indro dharma iti puccha-mūle
GP10bhp_05u:1303: dhātā vidhātā ca kaṭyāṃ saptarṣayaḥ tasya
GP10bhp_05u:1304: dakṣiṇāvarta-kuṇḍalī-bhūta-śarīrasya yāny udagayanāni dakṣiṇa-pārśve tu nakṣatrāṇy upakalpayanti dakṣiṇāyanāni tu savye yathā śiśumārasya kuṇḍalā-bhoga-sanniveśasya pārśvayor ubhayor apy avayavāḥ samasaṅkhyā bhavanti pṛṣṭhe tv ajavīthī ākāśa-gaṅgā codarataḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1305: BhP_05.23.006/1 punarvasu-puṣyau dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ śroṇyor ārdrāśleṣe ca
GP10bhp_05u:1307: nāsikayor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ śravaṇa-pūrvāṣāḍhe dakṣiṇa-vāmayor locanayor dhaniṣṭhā mūlaṃ ca dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ karṇayor maghādīny aṣṭa nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇāyanāni vāma-pārśva-vaṅkriṣu yuñjīta tathaiva mṛga-śīrṣādīny
GP10bhp_05u:1308: udagayanāni dakṣiṇa-pārśva-vaṅkriṣu prātilomyena prayuñjīta śatabhiṣā-jyeṣṭhe skandhayor dakṣiṇa-vāmayor nyaset
GP10bhp_05u:1309: BhP_05.23.007/1 uttarā-hanāv agastir adharā-hanau yamo mukheṣu cāṅgārakaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1310: śanaiścara upasthe bṛhaspatiḥ kakudi vakṣasy ādityo hṛdaye nārāyaṇo manasi candro nābhyām uśanā stanayor aśvinau budhaḥ prāṇāpānayo rāhur gale ketavaḥ sarvāṅgeṣu romasu sarve tārā-gaṇāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1311: BhP_05.23.008/1 etad u haiva bhagavato viṣṇoḥ sarva-devatāmayaṃ rūpam aharahaḥ sandhyāyāṃ prayato vāgyato nirīkṣamāṇa upatiṣṭheta namo jyotir-lokāya kālāyanāyānimiṣāṃ pataye mahā-puruṣāyābhidhīmahīti
GP10bhp_05u:1314: BhP_05.23.009/2 namasyataḥ smarato vā tri-kālaṃ naśyeta tat-kālajam āśu pāpam BhP_05.24.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
GP10bhp_05u:1315: BhP_05.24.001/1 adhastāt savitur yojanāyute svarbhānur nakṣatravac caratīty eke yo 'sāv amaratvaṃ grahatvaṃ cālabhata bhagavad-anukampayā
GP10bhp_05u:1316: svayam asurāpasadaḥ saiṃhikeyo hy atad-arhas tasya tāta janma karmāṇi copariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1317: BhP_05.24.002/1 yad adas taraṇer maṇḍalaṃ pratapatas tad vistarato yojanāyutam ācakṣate dvādaśa-sahasraṃ somasya trayodaśa-sahasraṃ rāhor yaḥ parvaṇi tad-vyavadhāna-kṛd vairānubandhaḥ sūryā-candramasāv abhidhāvati
GP10bhp_05u:1318: BhP_05.24.003/1 tan niśamyobhayatrāpi bhagavatā rakṣaṇāya prayuktaṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma bhāgavataṃ dayitam astraṃ tat tejasā durviṣahaṃ muhuḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1319: parivartamānam abhyavasthito muhūrtam udvijamānaś cakita-hṛdaya ārād eva nivartate tad uparāgam iti vadanti lokāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1320: BhP_05.24.004/1 tato 'dhastāt siddha-cāraṇa-vidyādharāṇāṃ sadanāni tāvan mātra eva BhP_05.24.005/1 tato 'dhastād yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-piśāca-preta-bhūta-gaṇānāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1321: vihārājiram antarikṣaṃ yāvad vāyuḥ pravāti yāvan meghā upalabhyante BhP_05.24.006/1 tato 'dhastāc chata-yojanāntara iyaṃ pṛthivī yāvad
GP10bhp_05u:1323: BhP_05.24.007/1 upavarṇitaṃ bhūmer yathā-sanniveśāvasthānam avaner apy adhastāt sapta bhū-vivarā ekaikaśo yojanāyutāntareṇāyāma-vistāreṇopakḷptā
GP10bhp_05u:1324: atalaṃ vitalaṃ sutalaṃ talātalaṃ mahātalaṃ rasātalaṃ pātālam iti BhP_05.24.008/1 eteṣu hi bila-svargeṣu svargād apy adhika-kāma-bhogaiśvaryānanda-bhūti-vibhūtibhiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1328: BhP_05.24.009/1 yeṣu mahārāja mayena māyāvinā vinirmitāḥ puro
GP10bhp_05u:1331: vivareśvara-gṛhottamaiḥ samalaṅkṛtāś cakāsati BhP_05.24.010/1 udyānāni cātitarāṃ mana-indriyānandibhiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1338: BhP_05.24.011/1 yatra ha vāva na bhayam aho-rātrādibhiḥ kāla-vibhāgair
GP10bhp_05u:1340: BhP_05.24.012/1 yatra hi mahāhi-pravara-śiro-maṇayaḥ sarvaṃ tamaḥ prabādhante
GP10bhp_05u:1342: divyauṣadhi-rasa-rasāyanānna-pāna-snānādibhir ādhayo vyādhayo valī-palita-jarādayaś ca deha-vaivarṇya-daurgandhya-sveda-klama-glānir iti vayo 'vasthāś ca bhavanti BhP_05.24.014/1 na hi teṣāṃ kalyāṇānāṃ prabhavati kutaścana mṛtyur vinā bhagavat-tejasaś cakrāpadeśāt
GP10bhp_05u:1343: BhP_05.24.015/1 yasmin praviṣṭe 'sura-vadhūnāṃ prāyaḥ puṃsavanāni bhayād
GP10bhp_05u:1345: BhP_05.24.016/1 athātale maya-putro 'suro balo nivasati yena ha vā iha
GP10bhp_05u:1346: sṛṣṭāḥ ṣaṇ-ṇavatir māyāḥ kāścanādyāpi māyāvino dhārayanti yasya ca
GP10bhp_05u:1347: jṛmbhamāṇasya mukhatas trayaḥ strī-gaṇā udapadyanta svairiṇyaḥ kāminyaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1348: puṃścalya iti yā vai bilāyanaṃ praviṣṭaṃ puruṣaṃ rasena hāṭakākhyena sādhayitvā sva-vilāsāvalokanānurāga-smita-saṃlāpopagūhanādibhiḥ svairaṃ kila ramayanti yasminn upayukte puruṣa īśvaro 'haṃ siddho 'ham ity
GP10bhp_05u:1349: ayuta-mahā-gaja-balam ātmānam abhimanyamānaḥ katthate madāndha iva BhP_05.24.017/1 tato 'dhastād vitale haro bhagavān hāṭakeśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1351: mithunī-bhūta āste yataḥ pravṛttā sarit-pravarā hāṭakī nāma bhavayor
GP10bhp_05u:1352: vīryeṇa yatra citrabhānur mātariśvanā samidhyamāna ojasā pibati tan niṣṭhyūtaṃ hāṭakākhyaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūṣaṇenāsurendrāvarodheṣu puruṣāḥ saha puruṣībhir dhārayanti BhP_05.24.018/1 tato 'dhastāt sutale udāra-śravāḥ puṇya-śloko
GP10bhp_05u:1353: virocanātmajo balir bhagavatā mahendrasya priyaṃ cikīrṣamāṇenāditer
GP10bhp_05u:1355: bhagavad-anukampayaiva punaḥ praveśita indrādiṣv avidyamānayā susamṛddhayā śriyābhijuṣṭaḥ sva-dharmeṇārādhayaṃs tam eva bhagavantam ārādhanīyam
GP10bhp_05u:1357: BhP_05.24.019/1 no evaitat sākṣātkāro bhūmi-dānasya yat tad bhagavaty
GP10bhp_05u:1361: BhP_05.24.020/1 yasya ha vāva kṣuta-patana-praskhalanādiṣu vivaśaḥ sakṛn nāmābhigṛṇan puruṣaḥ karma-bandhanam añjasā vidhunoti yasya haiva pratibādhanaṃ mumukṣavo 'nyathaivopalabhante
GP10bhp_05u:1362: BhP_05.24.021/1 tad bhaktānām ātmavatāṃ sarveṣām ātmany ātmada ātmatayaiva
GP10bhp_05u:1363: BhP_05.24.022/1 na vai bhagavān nūnam amuṣyānujagrāha yad uta punar ātmānusmṛti-moṣaṇaṃ māyāmaya-bhogaiśvaryam evātanuteti
GP10bhp_05u:1365: yācñā-cchalenāpahṛta-sva-śarīrāvaśeṣita-loka-trayo varuṇa-pāśaiś ca sampratimukto giri-daryāṃ cāpaviddha iti hovāca
GP10bhp_05u:1366: BhP_05.24.024/1 nūnaṃ batāyaṃ bhagavān artheṣu na niṣṇāto yo 'sāv indro yasya sacivo mantrāya vṛta ekāntato bṛhaspatis tam atihāya svayam upendreṇātmānam ayācatātmanaś cāśiṣo no eva tad-dāsyam
GP10bhp_05u:1367: ati-gambhīra-vayasaḥ kālasya manvantara-parivṛttaṃ kiyal loka-trayam idam
GP10bhp_05u:1368: BhP_05.24.025/1 yasyānudāsyam evāsmat-pitāmahaḥ kila vavre na tu
GP10bhp_05u:1369: sva-pitryaṃ yad utākutobhayaṃ padaṃ dīyamānaṃ bhagavataḥ param iti bhagavatoparate khalu sva-pitari
GP10bhp_05u:1372: BhP_05.24.027/1 tasyānucaritam upariṣṭād vistariṣyate yasya bhagavān svayam akhila-jagad-gurur nārāyaṇo dvāri gadā-pāṇir avatiṣṭhate
GP10bhp_05u:1375: BhP_05.24.028/1 tato 'dhastāt talātale mayo nāma dānavendras
GP10bhp_05u:1377: nirdagdha-sva-pura-trayas tat-prasādāl labdha-pado māyāvinām ācāryo mahādevena parirakṣito vigata-sudarśana-bhayo mahīyate
GP10bhp_05u:1378: BhP_05.24.029/1 tato 'dhastān mahātale kādraveyāṇāṃ sarpāṇāṃ naika-śirasāṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1380: mahā-bhogavantaḥ patattri-rājādhipateḥ puruṣa-vāhād anavaratam udvijamānāḥ sva-kalatrāpatya-suhṛt-kuṭumba-saṅgena kvacit pramattā viharanti
GP10bhp_05u:1381: BhP_05.24.030/1 tato 'dhastād rasātale daiteyā dānavāḥ paṇayo nāma nivāta-kavacāḥ kāleyā hiraṇya-puravāsina iti vibudha-pratyanīkā utpattyā mahaujaso mahā-sāhasino bhagavataḥ sakala-lokānubhāvasya harer eva tejasā
GP10bhp_05u:1382: pratihata-balāvalepā bileśayā iva vasanti ye vai saramayendra-dūtyā
GP10bhp_05u:1383: vāgbhir mantra-varṇābhir indrād bibhyati BhP_05.24.031/1 tato 'dhastāt pātāle nāga-loka-patayo
GP10bhp_05u:1385: mahā-bhogino mahāmarṣā nivasanti yeṣām u ha vai
GP10bhp_05u:1389: BhP_05.25.001/1 tasya mūla-deśe triṃśad-yojana-sahasrāntara āste yā vai
GP10bhp_05u:1390: kalā bhagavatas tāmasī samākhyātānanta iti sātvatīyā draṣṭṛ-dṛśyayoḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1391: saṅkarṣaṇam aham ity abhimāna-lakṣaṇaṃ yaṃ saṅkarṣaṇam ity ācakṣate
GP10bhp_05u:1393: sahasra-śirasa ekasminn eva śīrṣaṇi dhriyamāṇaṃ siddhārtha iva lakṣyate
GP10bhp_05u:1394: BhP_05.25.003/1 yasya ha vā idaṃ kālenopasañjihīrṣato 'marṣa-viracita-rucira-bhramad-bhruvor antareṇa sāṅkarṣaṇo nāma rudra
GP10bhp_05u:1395: ekādaśa-vyūhas try-akṣas tri-śikhaṃ śūlam uttambhayann udatiṣṭhat
GP10bhp_05u:1399: pramudita-manasaḥ khalu vilokayanti BhP_05.25.005/1 yasyaiva hi nāga-rāja-kumārya āśiṣa āśāsānāś cārv-aṅga-valaya-vilasita-viśada-vipula-dhavala-subhaga-rucira-bhuja-rajata-stambheṣv
GP10bhp_05u:1404: BhP_05.25.006/1 sa eva bhagavān ananto 'nanta-guṇārṇava ādi-deva
GP10bhp_05u:1412: eka-kuṇḍalo hala-kakudi kṛta-subhaga-sundara-bhujo bhagavān mahendro vāraṇendra iva kāñcanīṃ kakṣām udāra-līlo bibharti
GP10bhp_05u:1413: BhP_05.25.008/1 ya eṣa evam anuśruto dhyāyamāno mumukṣūṇām
GP10bhp_05u:1415: sattva-rajas-tamomayam antar-hṛdayaṃ gata āśu nirbhinatti tasyānubhāvān bhagavān svāyambhuvo nāradaḥ saha tumburuṇā sabhāyāṃ brahmaṇaḥ saṃślokayām
GP10bhp_05u:1419: BhP_05.25.009/3 yad-rūpaṃ dhruvam akṛtaṃ yad ekam ātman BhP_05.25.009/4 nānādhāt katham u ha veda tasya vartma
GP10bhp_05u:1420: BhP_05.25.010/1 mūrtiṃ naḥ puru-kṛpayā babhāra sattvaṃ BhP_05.25.010/2 saṃśuddhaṃ sad-asad idaṃ vibhāti tatra
GP10bhp_05u:1424: BhP_05.25.011/2 ārto vā yadi patitaḥ pralambhanād vā
GP10bhp_05u:1425: BhP_05.25.011/3 hanty aṃhaḥ sapadi nṛṇām aśeṣam anyaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1426: BhP_05.25.011/4 kaṃ śeṣād bhagavata āśrayen mumukṣuḥ BhP_05.25.012/1 mūrdhany arpitam aṇuvat
GP10bhp_05u:1429: BhP_05.25.012/4 ko vīryāṇy adhi gaṇayet sahasra-jihvaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1430: BhP_05.25.013/1 evam-prabhāvo bhagavān ananto BhP_05.25.013/2 duranta-vīryoru-guṇānubhāvaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1432: BhP_05.25.013/4 yo līlayā kṣmāṃ sthitaye bibharti BhP_05.25.014/1 etā hy eveha nṛbhir upagantavyā
GP10bhp_05u:1434: BhP_05.25.015/1 etāvatīr hi rājan puṃsaḥ pravṛtti-lakṣaṇasya dharmasya
GP10bhp_05u:1435: vipāka-gataya uccāvacā visadṛśā yathā-praśnaṃ vyācakhye kim anyat
GP10bhp_05u:1437: BhP_05.26.001/1 maharṣa etad vaicitryaṃ lokasya katham iti
GP10bhp_05u:1438: BhP_05.26.002/0 ṛṣir uvāca BhP_05.26.002/1 tri-guṇatvāt kartuḥ śraddhayā karma-gatayaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1439: sarvā eva sarvasya tāratamyena bhavanti BhP_05.26.002/1 athedānīṃ pratiṣiddha-lakṣaṇasyādharmasya tathaiva kartuḥ śraddhāyā vaisādṛśyāt karma-phalaṃ visadṛśaṃ bhavati yā hy anādy-avidyayā
GP10bhp_05u:1440: kṛta-kāmānāṃ tat-pariṇāma-lakṣaṇāḥ sṛtayaḥ sahasraśaḥ pravṛttās tāsāṃ prācuryeṇānuvarṇayiṣyāmaḥ BhP_05.26.003/0 rājovāca
GP10bhp_05u:1441: BhP_05.26.003/1 narakā nāma bhagavan kiṃ deśa-viśeṣā athavā bahis tri-lokyā āhosvid antarāla
GP10bhp_05u:1442: BhP_05.26.004/0 ṛṣir uvāca BhP_05.26.004/1 antarāla eva tri-jagatyās tu diśi dakṣiṇasyām adhastād bhūmer upariṣṭāc ca jalād yasyām agniṣvāttādayaḥ pitṛ-gaṇā diśi svānāṃ gotrāṇāṃ parameṇa samādhinā satyā evāśiṣa āśāsānā nivasanti
GP10bhp_05u:1443: BhP_05.26.005/1 yatra ha vāva bhagavān pitṛ-rājo vaivasvataḥ sva-viṣayaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1444: prāpiteṣu sva-puruṣair jantuṣu sampareteṣu yathā-karmāvadyaṃ doṣam
GP10bhp_05u:1446: BhP_05.26.006/1 tatra haike narakān eka-viṃśatiṃ gaṇayanti atha tāṃs te rājan nāma-rūpa-lakṣaṇato 'nukramiṣyāmas tāmisro 'ndhatāmisro rauravo mahārauravaḥ kumbhīpākaḥ kālasūtram asipatravanaṃ sūkaramukham andhakūpaḥ kṛmibhojanaḥ sandaṃśas taptasūrmir vajrakaṇṭaka-śālmalī vaitaraṇī pūyodaḥ prāṇarodho viśasanaṃ lālābhakṣaḥ sārameyādanam avīcir ayaḥpānam iti kiñca kṣārakardamo rakṣogaṇa-bhojanaḥ śūlaproto dandaśūko 'vaṭa-nirodhanaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1447: paryāvartanaḥ sūcīmukham ity aṣṭā-viṃśatir narakā vividha-yātanā-bhūmayaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1448: BhP_05.26.007/1 tatra yas tu para-vittāpatya-kalatrāṇy apaharati sa hi
GP10bhp_05u:1449: kāla-pāśa-baddho yama-puruṣair ati-bhayānakais tāmisre narake balān
GP10bhp_05u:1450: nipātyate anaśanānudapāna-daṇḍa-tāḍana-santarjanādibhir yātanābhir yātyamāno jantur yatra kaśmalam āsādita ekadaiva mūrcchām upayāti
GP10bhp_05u:1452: BhP_05.26.008/1 evam evāndhatāmisre yas tu vañcayitvā puruṣaṃ dārādīn upayuṅkte yatra śarīrī nipātyamāno yātanā-stho vedanayā naṣṭa-matir
GP10bhp_05u:1453: naṣṭa-dṛṣṭiś ca bhavati yathā vanaspatir vṛścyamāna-mūlas tasmād andhatāmisraṃ tam upadiśanti
GP10bhp_05u:1454: BhP_05.26.009/1 yas tv iha vā etad aham iti mamedam iti bhūta-droheṇa
GP10bhp_05u:1455: kevalaṃ sva-kuṭumbam evānudinaṃ prapuṣṇāti sa tad iha vihāya svayam eva tad-aśubhena raurave nipatati BhP_05.26.010/1 ye tv iha yathaivāmunā vihiṃsitā jantavaḥ paratra
GP10bhp_05u:1456: yama-yātanām upagataṃ ta eva ruravo bhūtvā tathā tam eva vihiṃsanti tasmād rauravam ity āhū rurur iti sarpād ati-krūra-sattvasyāpadeśaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1457: BhP_05.26.011/1 evam eva mahārauravo yatra nipatitaṃ puruṣaṃ kravyādā nāma ruravas taṃ kravyeṇa ghātayanti yaḥ kevalaṃ dehambharaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1458: BhP_05.26.012/1 yas tv iha vā ugraḥ paśūn pakṣiṇo vā prāṇata uparandhayati tam apakaruṇaṃ puruṣādair api vigarhitam amutra yamānucarāḥ kumbhīpāke
GP10bhp_05u:1460: BhP_05.26.013/1 yas tv iha brahma-dhruk sa kālasūtra-saṃjñake narake
GP10bhp_05u:1463: dahyamānāntar-bahiḥ-śarīra āste śete ceṣṭate 'vatiṣṭhati paridhāvati ca yāvanti paśu-romāṇi tāvad varṣa-sahasrāṇi
GP10bhp_05u:1464: BhP_05.26.014/1 yas tv iha vai nija-veda-pathād anāpady apagataḥ pākhaṇḍaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1465: copagatas tam asi-patravanaṃ praveśya kaśayā praharanti tatra hāsāv itas
GP10bhp_05u:1466: tato dhāvamāna ubhayato dhārais tāla-vanāsi-patraiś chidyamāna-sarvāṅgo hā hato 'smīti paramayā vedanayā mūrcchitaḥ pade pade nipatati sva-dharmahā
GP10bhp_05u:1468: BhP_05.26.015/1 yas tv iha vai rājā rāja-puruṣo vā adaṇḍye daṇḍaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1469: praṇayati brāhmaṇe vā śarīra-daṇḍaṃ sa pāpīyān narake 'mutra sūkaramukhe nipatati tatrātibalair viniṣpiṣyamāṇāvayavo yathaivehekṣukhaṇḍa ārta-svareṇa svanayan kvacin mūrcchitaḥ kaśmalam upagato yathaivehā-dṛṣṭa-doṣā uparuddhāḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1470: BhP_05.26.016/1 yas tv iha vai bhūtānām īśvaropakalpita-vṛttīnām
GP10bhp_05u:1472: vyathām ācarati sa paratrāndhakūpe tad-abhidroheṇa nipatati tatra hāsau
GP10bhp_05u:1474: maśaka-yūkā-matkuṇa-makṣikādibhir ye ke cābhidrugdhās taiḥ sarvato 'bhidruhyamāṇas tamasi vihata-nidrā-nirvṛtir alabdhāvasthānaḥ parikrāmati yathā kuśarīre jīvaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1475: BhP_05.26.017/1 yas tv iha vā asaṃvibhajyāśnāti yat kiñcanopanatam
GP10bhp_05u:1476: anirmita-pañca-yajño vāyasa-saṃstutaḥ sa paratra kṛmibhojane narakādhame nipatati tatra śata-sahasra-yojane kṛmi-kuṇḍe kṛmi-bhūtaḥ svayaṃ kṛmibhir eva bhakṣyamāṇaḥ kṛmi-bhojano yāvat tad aprattāprahūtādo 'nirveśam ātmānaṃ yātayate BhP_05.26.018/1 yas tv iha vai steyena balād vā hiraṇya-ratnādīni
GP10bhp_05u:1477: brāhmaṇasya vāpaharaty anyasya vānāpadi puruṣas tam amutra rājan yama-puruṣā ayasmayair agni-piṇḍaiḥ sandaṃśais tvaci niṣkuṣanti
GP10bhp_05u:1478: BhP_05.26.019/1 yas tv iha vā agamyāṃ striyam agamyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ yoṣid abhigacchati tāv amutra kaśayā tāḍayantas tigmayā sūrmyā lohamayyā puruṣam āliṅgayanti striyaṃ ca puruṣa-rūpayā sūrmyā
GP10bhp_05u:1479: BhP_05.26.020/1 yas tv iha vai sarvābhigamas tam amutra niraye vartamānaṃ
GP10bhp_05u:1480: vajrakaṇṭaka-śālmalīm āropya niṣkarṣanti BhP_05.26.021/1 ye tv iha vai rājanyā rāja-puruṣā vā apākhaṇḍā dharma-setūn bhindanti te samparetya vaitaraṇyāṃ nipatanti bhinna-maryādās
GP10bhp_05u:1481: tasyāṃ niraya-parikhā-bhūtāyāṃ nadyāṃ yādo-gaṇair itas tato bhakṣyamāṇā
GP10bhp_05u:1482: ātmanā na viyujyamānāś cāsubhir uhyamānāḥ svāghena karma-pākam anusmaranto
GP10bhp_05u:1484: BhP_05.26.022/1 ye tv iha vai vṛṣalī-patayo naṣṭa-śaucācāra-niyamās
GP10bhp_05u:1485: tyakta-lajjāḥ paśu-caryāṃ caranti te cāpi pretya
GP10bhp_05u:1488: BhP_05.26.023/1 ye tv iha vai śva-gardabha-patayo brāhmaṇādayo mṛgayā vihārā atīrthe ca mṛgān nighnanti tān api samparetān lakṣya-bhūtān
GP10bhp_05u:1489: yama-puruṣā iṣubhir vidhyanti BhP_05.26.024/1 ye tv iha vai dāmbhikā dambha-yajñeṣu paśūn viśasanti tān
GP10bhp_05u:1490: amuṣmin loke vaiśase narake patitān niraya-patayo yātayitvā viśasanti BhP_05.26.025/1 yas tv iha vai savarṇāṃ bhāryāṃ dvijo retaḥ pāyayati
GP10bhp_05u:1491: kāma-mohitas taṃ pāpa-kṛtam amutra retaḥ-kulyāyāṃ pātayitvā retaḥ sampāyayanti
GP10bhp_05u:1492: BhP_05.26.026/1 ye tv iha vai dasyavo 'gnidā garadā grāmān sārthān vā vilumpanti rājāno rāja-bhaṭā vā tāṃś cāpi hi paretya yamadūtā
GP10bhp_05u:1493: vajra-daṃṣṭrāḥ śvānaḥ sapta-śatāni viṃśatiś ca sarabhasaṃ khādanti
GP10bhp_05u:1494: BhP_05.26.027/1 yas tv iha vā anṛtaṃ vadati sākṣye dravya-vinimaye dāne vā kathañcit sa vai pretya narake 'vīcimaty adhaḥ-śirā niravakāśe
GP10bhp_05u:1495: yojana-śatocchrāyād giri-mūrdhnaḥ sampātyate yatra jalam iva sthalam aśma-pṛṣṭham avabhāsate tad avīcimat tilaśo viśīryamāṇa-śarīro na mriyamāṇaḥ punar āropito nipatati BhP_05.26.028/1 yas tv iha vai vipro rājanyo vaiśyo vā soma-pīthas
GP10bhp_05u:1496: tat-kalatraṃ vā surāṃ vrata-stho 'pi vā pibati pramādatas teṣāṃ nirayaṃ nītānām urasi padākramyāsye vahninā dravamāṇaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ niṣiñcanti
GP10bhp_05u:1497: BhP_05.26.029/1 atha ca yas tv iha vā ātma-sambhāvanena svayam adhamo janma-tapo-vidyācāra-varṇāśramavato varīyaso na bahu manyeta sa mṛtaka eva mṛtvā kṣārakardame niraye 'vāk-śirā nipātito durantā yātanā hy aśnute BhP_05.26.030/1 ye tv iha vai puruṣāḥ puruṣa-medhena yajante yāś ca striyo
GP10bhp_05u:1498: nṛ-paśūn khādanti tāṃś ca te paśava iva nihatā yama-sadane yātayanto
GP10bhp_05u:1499: rakṣo-gaṇāḥ saunikā iva svadhitināvadāyāsṛk pibanti nṛtyanti ca gāyanti ca hṛṣyamāṇā yatheha
GP10bhp_05u:1500: BhP_05.26.031/1 ye tv iha vā anāgaso 'raṇye grāme vā vaiśrambhakair
GP10bhp_05u:1501: upasṛtān upaviśrambhayya jijīviṣūn śūla-sūtrādiṣūpaprotān krīḍanakatayā yātayanti te 'pi ca pretya yama-yātanāsu śūlādiṣu protātmānaḥ kṣut-tṛḍbhyāṃ cābhihatāḥ kaṅka-vaṭādibhiś cetas tatas tigma-tuṇḍair
GP10bhp_05u:1503: BhP_05.26.032/1 ye tv iha vai bhūtāny udvejayanti narā ulbaṇa-svabhāvā
GP10bhp_05u:1504: yathā dandaśūkās te 'pi pretya narake dandaśūkākhye nipatanti yatra nṛpa
GP10bhp_05u:1505: dandaśūkāḥ pañca-mukhāḥ sapta-mukhā upasṛtya grasanti yathā bileśayān
GP10bhp_05u:1506: BhP_05.26.033/1 ye tv iha vā andhāvaṭa-kusūla-guhādiṣu bhūtāni nirundhanti tathāmutra teṣv evopaveśya sagareṇa vahninā dhūmena nirundhanti
GP10bhp_05u:1507: BhP_05.26.034/1 yas tv iha vā atithīn abhyāgatān vā gṛha-patir asakṛd
GP10bhp_05u:1508: upagata-manyur didhakṣur iva pāpena cakṣuṣā nirīkṣate tasya cāpi niraye pāpa-dṛṣṭer akṣiṇī vajra-tuṇḍā gṛdhrāḥ kaṅka-kāka-vaṭādayaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1510: BhP_05.26.035/1 yas tv iha vā āḍhyābhimatir ahaṅkṛtis tiryak-prekṣaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1512: nirvṛtim anavagato graha ivārtham abhirakṣati sa cāpi pretya tad-utpādanotkarṣaṇa-saṃrakṣaṇa-śamala-grahaḥ sūcīmukhe narake nipatati
GP10bhp_05u:1513: yatra ha vitta-grahaṃ pāpa-puruṣaṃ dharmarāja-puruṣā vāyakā iva sarvato
GP10bhp_05u:1514: 'ṅgeṣu sūtraiḥ parivayanti BhP_05.26.036/1 evaṃ-vidhā narakā yamālaye santi śataśaḥ sahasraśas
GP10bhp_05u:1515: sarveṣu ca sarva evādharma-vartino ye kecid ihoditā anuditāś cāvani-pate
GP10bhp_05u:1516: paryāyeṇa viśanti tathaiva dharmānuvartina itaratra iha tu punar-bhave ta
GP10bhp_05u:1518: BhP_05.26.037/1 nivṛtti-lakṣaṇa-mārga ādāv eva vyākhyātaḥ etāvān
GP10bhp_05u:1519: evāṇḍa-kośo yaś caturdaśadhā purāṇeṣu vikalpita upagīyate yat tad bhagavato nārāyaṇasya sākṣān mahā-puruṣasya sthaviṣṭhaṃ rūpam ātmamāyā-guṇamayam anuvarṇitam ādṛtaḥ paṭhati śṛṇoti śrāvayati sa upageyaṃ bhagavataḥ paramātmano 'grāhyam api śraddhā-bhakti-viśuddha-buddhir veda
GP10bhp_05u:1520: BhP_05.26.038/1 śrutvā sthūlaṃ tathā sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ bhagavato yatiḥ
GP10bhp_05u:1521: BhP_05.26.038/2 sthūle nirjitam ātmānaṃ śanaiḥ sūkṣmaṃ dhiyā nayed iti BhP_05.26.039/1
GP10bhp_05u:1523: BhP_05.26.039/3 gītā mayā tava nṛpādbhutam īśvarasya BhP_05.26.039/4 sthūlaṃ vapuḥ sakala-jīva-nikāya-dhāma
